 12085 00000AB7 268A4D13                		mov	cl, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12086                                  		;inc	cl
 12087                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12088 00000ABB 41                      		inc	cx
 12089 00000ABC 2A0E[3101]              		sub	cl, [cursec]
 12090 00000AC0 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
 12091 00000AC2 39C8                    		cmp	ax, cx
 12092 00000AC4 7302                    		jnb	short gotmin
 12093 00000AC6 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 12094                                  gotmin:
 12095                                  
 12096                                  ; ax is the requested number of sectors to read
 12097                                  ; cx is the number that we can do on this track
 12098                                  
 12099 00000AC8 50                      		push	ax
 12100 00000AC9 51                      		push	cx
 12101 00000ACA 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 12102 00000ACC E80D00                  		call	Disk
 12103 00000ACF 59                      		pop	cx
 12104 00000AD0 58                      		pop	ax
 12105                                  
 12106                                  ; cx is the number of sectors just transferred
 12107                                  
 12108 00000AD1 29C8                    		sub	ax, cx		; reduce sectors-remaining by last i/o
 12109 00000AD3 D0E1                    		shl	cl, 1
 12110 00000AD5 00CF                    		add	bh, cl		; adjust transfer address
 12111 00000AD7 EBC6                    		jmp	short block
 12112                                  dskerr_brdg:
 12113 00000AD9 E9E700                  		jmp	dskerr
 12114                                  
 12115                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12116                                  
 12117                                  ; 15/10/2022
 12118                                  
 12119                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12120                                  ;perform disk i/o with retries
 12121                                  ; al = number of sectors (1-8, all on one track)
 12122                                  ; es:di point to drive parameters
 12123                                  ; xfer_seg:bx = transfer address 
 12124                                  ;		(must not cross a 64k physical boundary)
 12125                                  ; [rflag] = 2 if read, 3 if write
 12126                                  ; [verify] = 0 for normal, 1 for verify after write
 12127                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12128                                  
 12129                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12130                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12131                                  Disk:
 12132                                  
 12133                                  ; Check for hard disk format and
 12134                                  ; if TRUE then set max error count to 2
 12135                                  
 12136 00000ADC BD0500                  		mov	bp, 5		; MAXERR
 12137                                  					; set up retry count
 12138                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12139 00000ADF 268A4D23                		mov	cl, [es:di+23h]
 12140 00000AE3 83E101                  		and	cx, 1
 12141                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12142                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 12143 00000AE6 7408                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 12144 00000AE8 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify ; Is this a	track verify?
 12145 00000AEB 7403                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 12146 00000AED BD0200                  		mov	bp, 2		; This is not verify so only 1 retry
 12147                                  GetRdWrInd:				
 12148 00000AF0 892E[2105]              		mov	[vretry_cnt], bp ; verify op. retry cnt for write-verify
 12149 00000AF4 892E[2305]              		mov	[soft_ecc_cnt], bp ; soft ecc error retry count.
 12150 00000AF8 8A26[2001]              		mov	ah, [rflag]	; get read/write indicator
 12151                                  ;retry:
 12152                                  ; 09/12/2022
 12153                                  _retry:
 12154 00000AFC 50                      		push	ax
 12155 00000AFD 8B16[3301]              		mov	dx, [curtrk]
 12156                                  		
 12157                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12158 00000B01 E30B                    		jcxz	disk_not_mini
 12159                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12160                                  		;jz	short disk_not_mini
 12161                                  		
 12162 00000B03 26837D4701              		cmp	word [es:di+47h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
 12163                                  					; is this a mini disk? ((logical dos partition))
 12164 00000B08 7504                    		jnz	short disk_not_mini ; no. continue to next.
 12165 00000B0A 26035549                		add	dx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
 12166                                  					; add hidden trks.
 12167                                  disk_not_mini:
 12168 00000B0E D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 12169 00000B10 D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 12170 00000B12 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 12171 00000B16 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 12172 00000B18 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 12173 00000B1A 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 12174 00000B1E 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 12175                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12176 00000B22 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 12177 00000B27 7411                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 12178                                  
 12179                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 12180                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 12181                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 12182                                  
 12183 00000B29 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12184                                  		;jz	short do_writej
 12185                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12186 00000B2E 7460                    		jz	short do_write
 12187 00000B30 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 12188 00000B33 7405                    		jz	short do_fast
 12189 00000B35 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 12190                                  		;jz	short do_fast
 12191                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12192 00000B38 7556                    		jnz	short do_write
 12193                                  ;do_writej:
 12194                                  
 12195                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 12196                                  			
 12197                                  		;jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 12198                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12199                                  
 12200                                  do_fast:
 12201 00000B3A E8FB00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 12202                                  testerr:
 12203 00000B3D 729A                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 12204                                  
 12205                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 12206                                  
 12207 00000B3F 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 12208 00000B43 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 12209                                  no_set:
 12210                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 12211 00000B47 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 12212 00000B4D 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 12213                                  noverify:
 12214 00000B4F 58                      		pop	ax
 12215                                  
 12216                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 12217                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 12218                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 12219                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 12220                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 12221                                  
 12222 00000B50 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12223                                  					; fnon_removable
 12224 00000B55 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 12225 00000B57 F606[1E05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 12226 00000B5C 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 12227                                  its_removable:
 12228 00000B5E 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 12229 00000B61 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 12230 00000B63 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 12231 00000B67 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 12232 00000B69 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 12233 00000B6D 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12234                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 12235 00000B71 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 12236 00000B73 C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 12237 00000B78 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 12238 00000B7C FEC6                    		inc	dh
 12239 00000B7E 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 12240 00000B82 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 12241 00000B84 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 12242 00000B86 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 12243                                  noxor:
 12244 00000B8A 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 12245                                  disk_ret:
 12246 00000B8E F8                      		clc
 12247 00000B8F C3                      		retn
 12248                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12249                                  
 12250                                  ; 15/10/2022
 12251                                  
 12252                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12253                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 12254                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 12255                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12256                                  
 12257                                  do_write:
 12258 00000B90 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 12259 00000B94 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 12260 00000B96 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 12261 00000B9A 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 12262                                  do_norm:
 12263 00000B9C E87500                  		call	normspeed
 12264 00000B9F EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 12265                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12266                                  
 12267                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12268                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 12269                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12270                                  
 12271                                  doverify:
 12272 00000BA1 58                      		pop	ax
 12273 00000BA2 50                      		push	ax
 12274 00000BA3 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 12275 00000BA5 E89000                  		call	fastspeed
 12276 00000BA8 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 12277                                  
 12278                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 12279                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 12280                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 12281                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 12282                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 12283                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 12284                                  
 12285 00000BAA 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 12286 00000BAD 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 12287 00000BAF FF0E[2305]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 12288 00000BB3 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 12289 00000BB5 E83305                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 12290 00000BB8 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 12291                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12292                                  
 12293                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.
 12294 00000BBA E82E05                  		call	ResetDisk
 12295 00000BBD FF0E[2105]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 12296 00000BC1 EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 12297                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12298                                  
 12299                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12300                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 12301                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 12302                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12303                                  
 12304                                  dskerr:
 12305 00000BC3 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 12306 00000BC8 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 12307 00000BCA E8F80C                  		call	checkio
 12308                                  dskerr_nochangeline:
 12309 00000BCD 803E[2505]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?

 12311 00000BD4 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 12312 00000BD7 C606[2505]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 12313                                  dochkagain:
 12314 00000BDC E8A900                  		call	again
 12315                                  dskerr0:
 12316 00000BDF 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 12317 00000BE1 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12318                                  					; fnon_removable
 12319 00000BE6 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 12320 00000BE8 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 12321 00000BEB 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 12322                                  skip_timeout_chk:
 12323 00000BED 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 12324 00000BF0 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 12325 00000BF2 C706[2305]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 12326                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 12327                                  dskerr1:
 12328 00000BF8 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 12329                                  		;jmp	retry
 12330                                  		; 09/12/2022
 12331 00000BF9 E900FF                  		jmp	_retry
 12332                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12333                                  
 12334                                  write_fault_err:

 12336                                  					; for write fault error.
 12337 00000BFF EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 12338                                  
 12339                                  		; fall into harderr
 12340                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12341                                  
 12342                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 12343                                  
 12344                                  harderr:

 12346                                  harderr2:

 12348                                  					; force a media check through rom
 12349 00000C09 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 12350 00000C0D 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 12351                                  
 12352                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 12353                                  
 12354                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 12355                                  		; 09/12/2022
 12356 00000C11 E917FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 12357                                  
 12358                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12359                                  
 12360                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 12361                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 12362                                  
 12363                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12364                                  normspeed:
 12365 00000C14 803E[2706]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 12366 00000C19 751D                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 12367 00000C1B 06                      		push	es
 12368 00000C1C 50                      		push	ax
 12369 00000C1D A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 12370 00000C20 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 12371 00000C24 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12372 00000C28 58                      		pop	ax
 12373 00000C29 07                      		pop	es
 12374 00000C2A E80B00                  		call	fastspeed
 12375                                  		; 24/12/2023
 12376                                  		;push	es
 12377                                  		;les	si, [dpt]
 12378                                  		;mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12379                                  		;			; 1 is fast settle value
 12380                                  		;pop	es
 12381 00000C2D 1E                      		push	ds
 12382 00000C2E C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 12383 00000C32 C6440901                		mov	byte [si+9], 1
 12384 00000C36 1F                      		pop	ds
 12385                                  
 12386 00000C37 C3                      		retn
 12387                                  
 12388                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12389                                  
 12390                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 12391                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 12392                                  
 12393                                  fastspeed:
 12394 00000C38 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 12395                                  					; ftoobig
 12396 00000C3D 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 12397 00000C3F 06                      		push	es
 12398 00000C40 8E06[2605]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12399 00000C44 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12400 00000C46 8C06[2605]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 12401 00000C4A 07                      		pop	es
 12402 00000C4B C3                      		retn
 12403                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12404                                  
 12405                                  notready:
 12406 00000C4C F9                      		stc
 12407 00000C4D B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 12408 00000C4F C3                      		retn
 12409                                  
 12410                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12411                                  
 12412                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 12413                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 12414                                  
 12415                                  maperror:
 12416 00000C50 51                      		push	cx
 12417 00000C51 06                      		push	es
 12418 00000C52 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 12419 00000C53 07                      		pop	es
 12420 00000C54 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 12421 00000C56 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 12422                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 12423 00000C59 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 12424                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 12425 00000C5C BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 12426 00000C5F F2AE                    		repne scasb
 12427                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12428                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 12429                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12430 00000C61 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 12431                                  					; get translation
 12432                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 12433                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 12434 00000C64 07                      		pop	es
 12435 00000C65 59                      		pop	cx
 12436 00000C66 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 12437 00000C67 C3                      		retn
 12438                                  
 12439                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12440                                  
 12441                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 12442                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 12443                                  
 12444                                  set_tim:
 12445 00000C68 50                      		push	ax
 12446 00000C69 E8AFF8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 12447                                  
 12448                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 12449                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 12450                                  
 12451 00000C6C 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 12452 00000C70 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 12453 00000C72 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 12454                                  		;jz	short done_set
 12455                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12456 00000C76 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 12457                                  setaccess:
 12458 00000C78 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 12459 00000C7D 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 12460 00000C81 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 12461                                  done_set:
 12462 00000C85 F8                      		clc
 12463                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 12464 00000C86 58                      		pop	ax
 12465 00000C87 C3                      		retn
 12466                                  
 12467                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12468                                  
 12469                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 12470                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 12471                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 12472                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 12473                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 12474                                  
 12475                                  again:	
 12476 00000C88 E86004                  		call	ResetDisk
 12477 00000C8B 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 12478 00000C8E 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 12479                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 12480 00000C90 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 12481 00000C91 C3                      		retn
 12482                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12483                                  
 12484                                  dont_dec_retry_count:
 12485 00000C92 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 12486 00000C94 C3                      		retn

 12499                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 12500                                  ;
 12501                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 12502                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 12503                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 12504                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 12505                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 12506                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 12507                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 12508                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 12516 00000C95 00                      		db 0

 12519                                  %if 0
 12520                                  
 12521                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 12522                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 12523                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	;gh ReadTrack

 12526                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12527                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc

 12529                                  		dw 1269h	; 67h	; GetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 12530                                  		dw 12C1h	; 68h	; SenseMediaType
 12531                                  
 12532                                  IoWriteJumpTable: db 7	; ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2

 12592                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12593                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 12594                                  ;
 12595                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 12596                                  ;
 12597                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 12598                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 12599                                  ;	subfunctions.
 12600                                  ;
 12601                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12602                                  
 12603                                  ; 11/03/2019
 12604                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12605                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 12606 00000CC5 E8A2F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 12607 00000CC8 06                      		push	es
 12608 00000CC9 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 12609 00000CCD 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12610                                  					; RAWIO
 12611 00000CD2 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 12612 00000CD6 07                      		pop	es
 12613 00000CD7 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 12614                                  
 12615                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 12616                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 12617                                  
 12618                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12619 00000CD9 BE[960C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 12620                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 12621                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 12622 00000CDC A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 12623 00000CDE 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 12624                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12625 00000CE0 BE[A90C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 12626                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 12627                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 12628                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 12629 00000CE3 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 12630 00000CE5 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 12631 00000CE7 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 12632 00000CEA 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 12633 00000CEC 98                      		cbw
 12634 00000CED D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12635 00000CEF 46                      		inc	si
 12636 00000CF0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12637 00000CF2 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 12638                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 12639 00000CF5 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12640                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12641                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 12642 00000CFA B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 12643 00000CFC C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 12644                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12645                                  
 12646                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 12647                                  		; as a fall through from above
 12648                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 12649 00000CFD 5A                      		pop	dx

 12658                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:

 12660                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 12661                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 12662                                  ;
 12663                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 12664                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 12665                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG

 12672

 12686

 12888                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12889                                  
 12890                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12891                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12892                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12893                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12894                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12895                                  ;
 12896                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12897                                  ;
 12898                                  ; output:
 12899                                  ;	for status call:
 12900                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12901                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12902                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12903                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12904                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12905                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12906                                  ;
 12907                                  ;	for format track:
 12908                                  ;		carry set if error
 12909                                  ;
 12910                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12911                                  
 12912                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12913                                  
 12914                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12915                                  FormatTrack:
 12916 00000E1F C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12917 00000E23 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 12918 00000E26 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12919                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT
 12920 00000E29 740E                    		jz	short DoFormatTrack
 12921 00000E2B 1E                      		push	ds
 12922                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12923 00000E2C 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12924                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12925 00000E31 E82302                  		call	SetMediaForFormat ; Also moves current Dpt to TempDpt
 12926 00000E34 1F                      		pop	ds
 12927 00000E35 8807                    		mov	[bx], al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12928 00000E37 F8                      		clc
 12929 00000E38 C3                      		retn
 12930                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13063                                  
 13064                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 13065                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 13066                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 13067                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 13068                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 13069                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 13070                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 13071                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 13072                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 13073                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 13074                                  		; register.
 13075                                  
 13076                                  					; Special function requested?

 13177                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13178                                  
 13179                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13180                                  
 13181                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13182                                  ;
 13183                                  ; TrackIo:
 13184                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 13185                                  ;
 13186                                  ;   input:
 13187                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 13188                                  ;		  3 = write
 13189                                  ;		  4 = verify
 13190                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 13191                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 13192                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 13193                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 13194                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 13195                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 13196                                  ;
 13197                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13198                                  
 13199                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13200                                  		
 13201                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13202                                  TrackIo:	
 13203                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 13204 00000F77 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 13205 00000F7B E84EF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 13206 00000F7E 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13207                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 13208 00000F83 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 13209 00000F85 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 13210 00000F86 51                      		push	cx
 13211 00000F87 E8CEFA                  		call	iosetup
 13212 00000F8A 59                      		pop	cx
 13213 00000F8B 58                      		pop	ax
 13214                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 13215 00000F8C BE[2A05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 13216 00000F8F D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 13217 00000F91 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 13218 00000F93 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 13219                                  
 13220                                  		; WE WANT:
 13221                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 13222                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 13223                                  		
 13224 00000F95 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 13225                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13226 00000F98 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 13227                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13228                                  					; good_tracklayout
 13229 00000F9D 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 13230                                  		
 13231 00000F9F 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 13232                                  ionextsector:				
 13233 00000FA1 51                      		push	cx
 13234 00000FA2 52                      		push	dx
 13235 00000FA3 46                      		inc	si
 13236 00000FA4 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 13237                                  					; the track table
 13238 00000FA5 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 13239 00000FA6 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 13240                                  
 13241                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 13242                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 13243                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 13244                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 13245                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 13246                                  		
 13247                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13248 00000FA9 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 13249                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13250                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 13251 00000FAE 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 13252                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13253 00000FB0 F606[1E05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 13254                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 13255                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 13256 00000FB5 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 13257 00000FB7 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 13258 00000FBB 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 13259 00000FBD E81CFB                  		call	Disk
 13260 00000FC0 5A                      		pop	dx
 13261 00000FC1 59                      		pop	cx
 13262 00000FC2 F8                      		clc
 13263 00000FC3 C3                      		retn
 13264                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13265                                  
 13266                                  IoRemovable:				
 13267 00000FC4 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 13268                                  					; table	and save it
 13269 00000FC5 50                      		push	ax
 13270 00000FC6 56                      		push	si
 13271 00000FC7 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 13272 00000FC8 50                      		push	ax

 13274                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 13275 00000FCD C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]

 13277 00000FD4 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 13278 00000FD7 58                      		pop	ax
 13279 00000FD8 1F                      		pop	ds
 13280 00000FD9 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13281 00000FDB A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 13282 00000FDE E8FBFA                  		call	Disk

 13284                                  					; sector size
 13285                                  		;pop	ax

 13287 00000FE2 59                      		pop	cx
 13288                                  
 13289                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13290                                  		;call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 13291                                  		;mov	cl, al	; 24/12/2023
 13292 00000FE3 B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 13293 00000FE6 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 13294                                  
 13295 00000FE8 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 13296 00000FEA 5A                      		pop	dx
 13297 00000FEB 59                      		pop	cx

 13299 00000FEE 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1

 13301                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13302 00000FF3 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 13303 00000FF5 E829FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 13304                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 13305                                  NoNeedDone:

 13307                                  NoNeedDone2:

 13310                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13311                                  
 13312                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13313                                  ;
 13314                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 13315                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 13316                                  ; are permissible.
 13317                                  ;
 13318                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 13319                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 13320                                  ; All other registers preserved
 13321                                  ;
 13322                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13352                                  ;
 13353                                  ; SetDASD
 13354                                  ;
 13355                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 13356                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 13357                                  ;
 13358                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 13359                                  ;
 13360                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13361                                  
 13362                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13363                                  SetDasd:
 13364 00000FFA 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 13365                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 13366 00000FFF 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 13367                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13368 00001001 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 13369                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13370                                  					; set_dasd_true
 13371 00001006 7446                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 13372                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13373 00001008 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 13374                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13375                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 13376                                  DoSetDasd:
 13377 0000100D C606[2806]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 13378 00001012 C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 13379 00001017 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 13380                                  		; 02/09/2023

 13436                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13437                                  
 13438                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13439                                  
 13440                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13441                                  ;
 13442                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 13443                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 13444                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 13445                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 13446                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 13447                                  ;
 13448                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 13449                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 13450                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 13451                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 13452                                  ;
 13453                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 13454                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 13455                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 13456                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 13457                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 13458                                  ;
 13459                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13460                                  
 13461                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13462                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 13463 00001057 51                      		push	cx
 13464 00001058 52                      		push	dx
 13465                                  
 13466                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 13467                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 13468                                  
 13469 00001059 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13470 0000105E 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 13471 00001060 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 13472 00001062 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13473 00001067 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 13474 00001069 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 13475                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13476                                  
 13477                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 13478 0000106B 06                      		push	es
 13479 0000106C 56                      		push	si
 13480                                  
 13481                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13482                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors

 13484 0000106F 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 13485                                  
 13486 00001071 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13487                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 13488                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 13489 00001076 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 13490 0000107A 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 13491

 13493                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 13494

 13499 00001085 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 13500 00001089 49                      		dec	cx
 13501 0000108A 80E503                  		and	ch, 3

 13503 0000108F D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 13504 00001091 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 13505 00001093 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 13506 00001097 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13507 0000109B 06                      		push	es
 13508 0000109C 1E                      		push	ds
 13509 0000109D 56                      		push	si
 13510 0000109E 57                      		push	di
 13511 0000109F B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 13512 000010A1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 13513                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 13514 000010A3 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 13515 000010A5 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13516 000010AA 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 13517 000010AC 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 13518                                  
 13519                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13520                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 13521 000010AD 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 13522 000010AF 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 13523 000010B1 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 13524                                  
 13525 000010B2 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13526                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 13527                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 13528 000010B7 8936[2906]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 13529 000010BB 8C06[2B06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 13530

 13533                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 13534                                  		;mov	es, si

 13540 000010C5 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]

 13542                                  skip_disk_base_setting:

 13598                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13599                                  ;
 13600                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 13601                                  ;
 13602                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 13603                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 13604                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 13605                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 13606                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 13607                                  ;
 13608                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13609                                  
 13610                                  ResetDisk:
 13611 000010EB 50                      		push	ax

 13615 000010EF 3806[2706]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 13616                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13617                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 13618 000010F3 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 13619                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 13620                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 13621 000010F5 A2[2806]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 13622                                  ResetDisk_cont:

 13624                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 13625 000010F8 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 13626                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 13627 000010FA C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 13628                                  					; Zap up the speed
 13629 000010FF 58                      		pop	ax

 13636                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13637                                  ;
 13638                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 13639                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 13640                                  ;
 13641                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 13642                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 13643                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 13644                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 13645                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 13646                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 13647                                  ;
 13648                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 13649                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 13650                                  ;
 13651                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13652                                  
 13653                                  		; 24/12/2023

 13655                                  ToRom:	
 13656 00001101 53                      		push	bx

 13710                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 13712                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13713                                  
 13714                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13715                                  ;
 13716                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13717                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13718                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13719                                  ;
 13720                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13721                                  
 13722                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13723                                  ioctl_getown:
 13724 00001157 E810F4                  		call	SetDrive
 13725 0000115A 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13726                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13727 0000115E C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13728                                  ownloop:				
 13729 00001162 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13730 00001166 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13731                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13732 00001168 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13733                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13734                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13735 0000116D 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13736                                  getnextBDS:				
 13737 0000116F 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13738 00001172 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13739                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13740                                  
 13741                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13742                                  ;
 13743                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13744                                  ; in al to al.
 13745                                  ;
 13746                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13747                                  
 13748                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13749                                  ioctl_setown:
 13750 00001174 E8F3F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13751 00001177 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13752                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13753 0000117C E84DF7                  		call	checksingle
 13754                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13755 0000117F FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13756                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13757                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13758                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13759                                  
 13760                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13761                                  ;
 13762                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13763                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13764                                  ;
 13765                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13766

 13778                                  exitnomult:

 13781                                  					; Exit normal termination
 13782                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13783                                  		; cf=0
 13784                                  		;clc
 13785 00001199 C3                      		retn

 13793                                  ; moves the old Dpt that had been saved in TempDpt back to Dpt. this is done
 13794                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.
 13795                                  ; all registers (including flags) are preserved.

 13803                                  		; do not do it again.
 13804

 13835                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13836                                  		; cf=0
 13837                                  		;clc			;  Clear carry
 13838 000011C1 C3                      		retn
 13839

 13842                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13843                                  
 13844                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13845                                  ;	get media id
 13846                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13847                                  ;
 13848                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13849                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13850                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13851                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13852                                  ;
 13853                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13854                                  ;
 13855                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13856                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13857                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13858                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13859                                  ;
 13860                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13861                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13862                                  ;
 13863                                  ; LOGIC:
 13864                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13865                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13866                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13867                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13868                                  ;
 13869                                  ; {
 13870                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13871                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13872                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13873                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13874                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13875                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13876                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13877                                  ;		};
 13878                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13879                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13880                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13881                                  ;		};
 13882                                  ;	else
 13883                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13884                                  ;
 13885                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13886                                  
 13887                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13888                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13889                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13890                                  
 13891                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13892                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13893                                  GetMediaId:
 13894 000011C2 E89900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13895 000011C5 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13896 000011C9 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13897 000011CE E87500                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13898 000011D1 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13899                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13900 000011D3 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13901                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13902                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13903                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13904 000011D8 721B                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	
 13905                                  
 13906                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13907 000011DA BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13908 000011DD 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13909                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13910                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13911 000011E0 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13912 000011E2 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13913 000011E6 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13914                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13915 000011EA 46                      		inc	si
 13916                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13917                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13918 000011EB 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13919                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 13920 000011EE B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13921                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13922                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13923 000011F1 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13924                                  	
 13925                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13926                                  		; cf = 0
 13927                                  		;clc
 13928                                  
 13929 000011F3 C3                      		retn
 13930                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13931                                  
 13932                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13933                                  IOCtl_If2:
 13934 000011F4 F9                      		stc	
 13935                                  IOCtl_If7:
 13936 000011F5 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13937                                  		;stc
 13938                                  IOCtl_If6:
 13939                                  IOCtl_If1:
 13940 000011F7 C3                      		retn
 13941                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13942                                  
 13943                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13944                                  
 13945                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13946                                  ;  set media id
 13947                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13948                                  
 13949                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13950                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13951                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13952                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13953                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13954                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13955                                  ;
 13956                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13957                                  ;
 13958                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13959                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13960                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13961                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13962                                  ;
 13963                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13964                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13965                                  ;
 13966                                  ; logic:
 13967                                  ;
 13968                                  ; {
 13969                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13970                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13971                                  ;	BootIo;
 13972                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13973                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13974                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13975                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13976                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13977                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13978                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13979                                  ;		};
 13980                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13981                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13982                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13983                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13984                                  ;		};
 13985                                  ;	else
 13986                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13987                                  ;
 13988                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13989                                  
 13990                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13991                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13992                                  SetMediaId:
 13993 000011F8 E86300                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13994 000011FB 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13995                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13996 000011FF 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13997 00001201 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13998 00001206 52                      		push	dx
 13999 00001207 E83C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 14000 0000120A 5A                      		pop	dx
 14001 0000120B 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 14002                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 14003 0000120D 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 14004                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 14005 00001212 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 14006                                  		
 14007 00001214 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 14008                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14009                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 14010                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14011 00001219 75D9                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2
 14012                                  
 14013 0000121B 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 14014 0000121C 57                      		push	di
 14015 0000121D 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 14016 0000121E 07                      		pop	es
 14017 0000121F BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 14018 00001222 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 14019 00001226 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14020 00001229 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 14021                                  
 14022                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14023                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14024                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 14025                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 14026                                  		;rep movsb
 14027 0000122C E8BFFF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 14028                                  
 14029 0000122F 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 14030 00001230 1F                      		pop	ds
 14031 00001231 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 14032 00001232 07                      		pop	es
 14033 00001233 E892F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 14034 00001236 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 14035 00001238 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 14036 0000123D E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 14037 00001240 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 14038                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 14039                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 14040 00001245 C3                      		retn
 14041                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14042                                  
 14043                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14044                                  ;IOCtl_If7:
 14045                                  ;		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 14046                                  ;		stc
 14047                                  ;IOCtl_If6:
 14048                                  ;		retn
