 14050                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14051                                  
 14052                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14053                                  
 14054                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14055                                  ;	BootIo
 14056                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14057                                  ;
 14058                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 14059                                  ;
 14060                                  ; input :
 14061                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 14062                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 14063                                  ;
 14064                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 14065                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 14066                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 14067                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 14068                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 14069                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 14070                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 14071                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 14072                                  ;
 14073                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 14074                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 14075                                  ;
 14076                                  ; logic:
 14077                                  ;
 14078                                  ; {
 14079                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 14080                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 14081                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 14082                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 14083                                  ; }
 14084                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14085                                  
 14086                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14087                                  BootIo:	
 14088 00001246 06                      		push	es
 14089 00001247 57                      		push	di
 14090 00001248 53                      		push	bx
 14091 00001249 1E                      		push	ds
 14092 0000124A 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 14093                                  
 14094                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 14095                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 14096                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 14097                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 14098                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 14099                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 14100                                  
 14101 0000124B BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 14102 0000124E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 14103 00001250 8916[1C05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 14104 00001254 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 14105 00001257 E8FCF6                  		call	diskio
 14106 0000125A 5B                      		pop	bx
 14107 0000125B 5F                      		pop	di
 14108 0000125C 07                      		pop	es
 14109 0000125D C3                      		retn
 14110                                  
 14111                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14112                                  
 14113                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14114                                  
 14115                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14116                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 14117                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14118                                  ;
 14119                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 14120                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 14121                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 14122                                  ; history in the flags.
 14123                                  ;
 14124                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 14125                                  ;
 14126                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 14127                                  ;
 14128                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 14129                                  ;
 14130                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 14131                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 14132                                  ;
 14133                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14134                                  
 14135                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 14136 0000125E 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14137 00001262 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 14138 00001264 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 14139                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14140 00001266 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 14141                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14142                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 14143 0000126B 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14144 0000126D 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 14145 00001272 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14146 00001274 E8EA06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 14147 00001277 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 14148                                  
 14149                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 14150                                  
 14151 00001279 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14152 0000127B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14153                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14154                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14155 0000127D 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14156 0000127F 53                      		push	bx
 14157 00001280 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 14158                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 14159                                  					; physical drive
 14160 00001283 E8B406                  		call	set_changed_dl
 14161 00001286 5B                      		pop	bx
 14162                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 14163 00001287 C3                      		retn
 14164                                  
 14165                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14166

 14169                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14170                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 14171                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14172                                  ;
 14173                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 14174                                  ;
 14175                                  ; INPUT :
 14176                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 14177                                  ;
 14178                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 14179                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 14180                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14181                                  
 14182                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14183                                  GetAccessFlag:
 14184 00001288 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 14185 0000128C C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14186                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 14187                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14188 0000128F 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 14189                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14190 00001291 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 14191                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14192                                  					; unformatted_media
 14193 00001296 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 14194                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 14195                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14196 00001298 40                      		inc	ax
 14197                                  GafDone:
 14198 00001299 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 14199 0000129C C3                      		retn
 14200                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14201                                  
 14202                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14203                                  
 14204                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14205                                  ;	SetAccessFlag

 14207                                  ;
 14208                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 14209                                  ;
 14210                                  ; input :

 14212                                  ;
 14213                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 14214                                  ; ==========================================================================

 14220                                  		; 10/12/2022

 14222                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14223                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 14224 000012A9 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 14225 000012AD 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 14226                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14227 000012AF 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 14228                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14229                                  					; unformatted_media
 14230                                  saf_Done:				
 14231 000012B4 C3                      		retn

 14236                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14237                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 14238                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14239                                  ;
 14240                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 14241                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 14242                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 14243                                  ;
 14244                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14245                                  
 14246                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14247                                  ioctl_support_query:
 14248 000012B5 06                      		push	es
 14249 000012B6 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 14250 000012BA 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 14251                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 14252                                  
 14253                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14254                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 14255                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 14256                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 14257                                  
 14258 000012BE 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 14259                                  					; See if major code is 8
 14260 000012C0 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 14261                                  ioctl_support:
 14262 000012C2 0E                      		push	cs
 14263 000012C3 07                      		pop	es
 14264                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14265                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 14266 000012C4 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 14267                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14268 000012C7 BF[BA0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 14269                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 14270                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 14271 000012CA 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 14272 000012CC F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 14273 000012CE 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 14274 000012D0 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 14275                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14276                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 14277                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 14278                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 14279                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 14280                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14281                                  ioctlsupexit:
 14282 000012D3 07                      		pop	es
 14283                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14284                                  		; cf = 0
 14285                                  		;clc
 14286 000012D4 C3                      		retn
 14287                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14288                                  nosupport:
 14289 000012D5 07                      		pop	es
 14290 000012D6 E9FCED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 14291                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 14294                                  
 14295                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14296                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 14297                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14298                                  ;
 14299                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 14300                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 14301                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 14302                                  ;	    drive)
 14303                                  ;
 14304                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 14305                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 14306                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 14307                                  ;
 14308                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 14309                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 14310                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 14311                                  ;
 14312                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 14313                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 14314                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 14315                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 14316                                  ;
 14317                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 14318                                  ;
 14319                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 14320                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 14321                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 14322                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 14323                                  ; 
 14324                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14325                                  
 14326                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14327                                  SenseMediaType:				
 14328 000012D9 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 14329 000012DD C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14330                                  		; 10/10/2022
 14331                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 14332 000012E0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14333 000012E2 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 14334                                  		;
 14335 000012E4 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14336                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 14337                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14338                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 14339 000012E8 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 14340                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 14341 000012EA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 14342 000012EC 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 14343 000012EE FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 14344                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 14345 000012F0 FEC8                    		dec	al
 14346 000012F2 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 14347 000012F4 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 14348 000012F6 0404                    		add	al, 4
 14349 000012F8 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 14350 000012FA 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 14351 000012FC 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 14352 000012FE 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 14353                                  GotMediaType:				
 14354 00001300 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 14355                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14356                                  		; cf = 0
 14357                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 14358 00001303 C3                      		retn
 14359                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14360                                  
 14361                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 14362 00001304 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 14363 00001307 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error

 14365 0000130B 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 14366 0000130E 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 14367                                  UnknownMediaType:

 14369                                  SenseErrExit:

 14371 00001314 F9                      		stc
 14372 00001315 C3                      		retn

 14378                                  
 14379                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14380                                  
 14381                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14382                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 14383                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14384                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14385                                  
 14386                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 14387                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 14388                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 14389                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 14390                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 14391                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 14392                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 14393                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 14394                                  ;
 14395                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 14396                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 14397                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 14398                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 14399                                  ;
 14400                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 14401                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 14402                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 14403                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 14404                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 14405                                  ;
 14406                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 14407                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 14408                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 14409                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 14410                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 14411                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 14412                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 14413                                  
 14414                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 14415                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 14416                                  
 14417                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14418                                  
 14419                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 14420 00001316 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 14421 00001319 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 14422 0000131B 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 14423 0000131E 7431                    		jz	short mine
 14424                                  
 14425                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 14426                                  
 14427 00001320 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386

 14430 00001328 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 14431 0000132A E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 14432                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14433                                  
 14434                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 14435 0000132D CF                      		iret
 14436                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14437

 14445                                  		; 19/10/2022

 14447                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can

 14458                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax

 14460                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es

 14610                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 14611                                  		;dec	bx
