 15722                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15723                                  
 15724                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15725                                  
 15726                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15727                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 15728                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15729                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 15730                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15731                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15732                                  
 15733                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 15734 000017C7 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 15735 000017C9 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 15735 000017D2 736B6574746520666F-
 15735 000017DB 7220647269766520   
 15736                                  
 15737                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 15738 000017E3 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 15738 000017EC 65737320616E79206B-
 15738 000017F5 6579207768656E2072-
 15738 000017FE 656164790D0A       
 15739 00001804 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 15740                                  
 15741                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15742                                  
 15743                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15744                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15745                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15746                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15747                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15748                                  
 15749                                  chkopcnt:		
 15750 00001806 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15751 0000180B C3                      		retn
 15752                                  
 15753                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15754                                  
 15755                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15756                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15757                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15758                                  ;
 15759                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15760                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15761                                  
 15762                                  mediacheck:	
 15763 0000180C E8BDF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15764 0000180F 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15765 00001811 E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15766 00001814 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15767 00001816 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15768 00001819 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15769 0000181B 50                      		push	ax
 15770 0000181C 52                      		push	dx
 15771 0000181D 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15772                                  					; set logical drive number
 15773 00001821 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15774 00001823 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15775                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15776                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15777 00001825 5A                      		pop	dx
 15778 00001826 58                      		pop	ax
 15779 00001827 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15780 00001829 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15781                                  
 15782                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15783                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15784                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15785                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15786                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15787                                  ; status.
 15788                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15789 0000182C 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15790 00001830 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15791                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15792                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15793                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15794                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15795 00001834 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15796                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15797                                  
 15798                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15799                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15800                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15801                                  
 15802 00001836 50                      		push	ax
 15803 00001837 51                      		push	cx
 15804 00001838 52                      		push	dx
 15805 00001839 E8B4ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15806 0000183C 5A                      		pop	dx
 15807 0000183D 59                      		pop	cx
 15808 0000183E 58                      		pop	ax
 15809 0000183F 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15810 00001841 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15811                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15812 00001843 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15813                                  mediaret:				
 15814 00001845 C3                      		retn
 15815                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15816                                  
 15817                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15818                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15819                                  ; or write.
 15820                                  
 15821                                  mediadovolid:				
 15822 00001846 E847EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15823 00001849 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15824 0000184B E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15825 0000184E 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15826 00001850 E9FDF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15827                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15828                                  
 15829                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15830                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15831                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15832                                  ; dos.
 15833                                  ;
 15834                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15835                                  
 15836                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15837                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15838                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15839                                  
 15840                                  checklatchio:	
 15841                                  
 15842                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15843                                  			
 15844 00001853 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15845 00001856 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15846                                  
 15847                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15848                                  
 15849 00001858 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15850 0000185B 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15851                                  
 15852                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15853                                  ; expensive verification.
 15854                                  
 15855 0000185D E830EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15856 00001860 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15857 00001862 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15858 00001865 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15859 00001867 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15860 00001869 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15861 0000186B E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15862                                  checklatchret:				
 15863 0000186E E8DFF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15864                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15865 00001871 F9                      		stc
 15866 00001872 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15867                                  checkret:				
 15868 00001873 C3                      		retn
 15869                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15870                                  
 15871                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15872                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15873                                  ;
 15874                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15875                                  
 15876                                  checkfatvid:				
 15877 00001874 E8BC01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15878 00001877 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15879 00001879 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15880                                  
 15881                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15882                                  
 15883                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15884                                  
 15885                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15886                                  
 15887                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15888                                  ;
 15889                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15890                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15891                                  ;
 15892                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15893                                  ;
 15894                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15895                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15896                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15897                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15898                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15899                                  ;
 15900                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15901                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15902                                  ; routine.)
 15903                                  ;
 15904                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15905                                  
 15906                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15907                                  check_vid:
 15908                                  
 15909                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15910                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15911                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15912                                  
 15913 0000187B 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15914                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15915                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15916 00001880 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15917 00001882 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15918 00001885 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15919 00001887 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15920 00001889 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15921                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15922 0000188E 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15923                                  					; if not fat system
 15924 00001890 E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15925 00001893 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15926 00001895 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15927 00001898 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15928                                  					; definitely changed
 15929 0000189B 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15930                                  
 15931 0000189D 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15932                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15933 0000189E E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15934                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15935                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15936                                  		;clc
 15937                                  checkfatret:				
 15938 000018A1 C3                      		retn
 15939                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15940                                  
 15941                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15942                                  changed_drv:
 15943 000018A2 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15944 000018A3 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15945                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15946 000018A8 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15947                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15948                                  
 15949                                  ; extended id check
 15950                                  
 15951                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15952                                  
 15953                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15954                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15955                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15956                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15957                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15958                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15959                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15960                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15961                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15962                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15963                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15964                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15965                                  ;
 15966                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15967                                  
 15968                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15969                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15970 000018A9 50                      		push	ax
 15971                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15972                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15973 000018AA A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15974                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15975 000018AD 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15976 000018AF 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15977 000018B3 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15978 000018B5 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15979 000018B8 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15980 000018BC 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15981                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15982                                  					; don't know
 15983 000018BE 58                      		pop	ax
 15984 000018BF EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15985                                  					; reset the flag
 15986                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15987                                  
 15988                                  ext_changed:
 15989 000018C1 58                      		pop	ax
 15990                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15991 000018C2 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15992                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15993                                  					; disk changed!
 15994                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15995                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15996                                  		;clc
 15997 000018C3 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15998                                  
 15999                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16000                                  
 16001                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 16002                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 16003                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 16004                                  ;
 16005                                  ; es:di -> bds
 16006                                  
 16007                                  checkio:				
 16008 000018C5 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 16009 000018C8 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 16010 000018CA E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 16011 000018CD 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 16012 000018CF E8BEED                  		call	GetBp
 16013 000018D2 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 16014 000018D4 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 16015 000018D7 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 16016 000018D9 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 16017 000018DB 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 16018 000018DD 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 16019 000018DE C3                      		retn
 16020                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16021                                  
 16022                                  checkioerr:				
 16023 000018DF E80700                  		call	returnvid
 16024                                  
 16025                                  checkioret:				
 16026 000018E2 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 16027 000018E3 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr
 16028                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16029                                  
 16030                                  no_error_map:				
 16031 000018E6 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr2
 16032                                  
 16033                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16034                                  
 16035                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 16036                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 16037                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 16038                                  
 16039                                  returnvid:		
 16040 000018E9 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 16041                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 16042 000018EC E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 16043 000018EF B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 16044 000018F1 F9                      		stc
 16045 000018F2 C3                      		retn
 16046                                  
 16047                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16048                                  
 16049                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 16050                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 16051                                  ;
 16052                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 16053                                  ; **trashes si**
 16054                                  
 16055                                  media_set_vid:				
 16056 000018F3 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 16057                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 16058                                  
 16059                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 16060                                  
 16061                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16062                                  
 16063                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 16064                                  
 16065                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16066                                  vid_into_packet:
 16067 000018F6 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 16068 000018F7 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 16069 000018FB 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16070 000018FE 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 16071 00001900 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16072 00001903 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 16073 00001906 1F                      		pop	ds
 16074                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 16075 00001907 C3                      		retn
 16076                                  
 16077                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16078                                  
 16079                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16080                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 16081                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 16082                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 16083                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 16084                                  ;
 16085                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 16086                                  ;		ah has media byte
 16087                                  ;
 16088                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 16089                                  ;		    no registers modified
 16090                                  ;		carry set
 16091                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 16092                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 16093                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 16094                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 16095                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 16096                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 16097                                  ;
 16098                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16099                                  
 16100                                  hidensity:
 16101                                  
 16102                                  ; check for correct drive
 16103                                  		
 16104                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16105 00001908 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 16106                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 16107                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 16108 0000190D 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 16109                                  
 16110                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 16111                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 16112                                  
 16113 0000190F 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 16114 00001914 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 16115                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 16116                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 16117 00001916 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 16118 00001919 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 16119                                  
 16120                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 16121                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 16122                                  
 16123                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16124 0000191B 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16125 0000191F 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 16126                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16127                                  					; ffOther
 16128 00001921 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 16129 00001923 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 16130                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16131                                  					; ff288
 16132 00001925 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 16133 00001927 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 16134 00001929 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 16135                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 16136                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 16137 0000192C B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 16138                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 16139                                  					; 2 sides
 16140                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16141 0000192F 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 16142 00001930 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 16143                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 16144                                  					; & head max
 16145                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 16146 00001933 E9C6ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 16147                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16148                                  
 16149                                  Is720K:
 16150                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16151 00001936 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 16152                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 16153 00001937 E98CED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 16154                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16155                                  
 16156                                  		; 18/12/2022
 16157                                  ;dofloppy:
 16158                                  		;retn
 16159                                  
 16160                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16161                                  
 16162                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16163                                  
 16164                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16165                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 16166                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 16167                                  ;
 16168                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 16169                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 16170                                  ;   outputs:	none
 16171                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 16172                                  ;
 16173                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 16174                                  ;
 16175                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 16176                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16177                                  
 16178                                  set_changed_dl:	
 16179 0000193A 06                      		push	es
 16180 0000193B 57                      		push	di
 16181                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 16182                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16183 0000193C C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 16184                                  
 16185                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 16186                                  
 16187                                  scan_bds:				
 16188 00001940 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16189 00001944 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 16190                                  
 16191                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 16192                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 16193                                  
 16194 00001946 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16195                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 16196                                  get_next_bds:				
 16197 0000194A 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 16198                                  					; go to	next bds
 16199 0000194D 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 16200 00001950 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 16201 00001952 5F                      		pop	di
 16202 00001953 07                      		pop	es
 16203 00001954 C3                      		retn
 16204                                  
 16205                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16206                                  
 16207                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16208                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 16209                                  ;
 16210                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 16211                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 16212                                  ;		zero reset - change
 16213                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16214                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16215                                  
 16216                                  checkromchange:	
 16217                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 16218                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16219 00001955 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 16220                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16221                                  					; fchanged
 16222 0000195A C3                      		retn
 16223                                  
 16224                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16225                                  
 16226                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16227                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 16228                                  ;
 16229                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 16230                                  ;   outputs:	none
 16231                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16232                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16233                                  
 16234                                  resetchanged:	
 16235                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 16236                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16237 0000195B 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 16238                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16239                                  					; ~fchanged
 16240 00001960 C3                      		retn
 16241                                  
 16242                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16243                                  
 16244                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16245                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 16246                                  ;
 16247                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 16248                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 16249                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 16250                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16251                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16252                                  
 16253                                  haschange:
 16254                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 16255                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16256 00001961 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 16257                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16258                                  					; fchangeline
 16259 00001966 C3                      		retn
 16260                                  
 16261                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16262                                  
 16263                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16264                                  
 16265                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16266                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 16267                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 16268                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 16269                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 16270                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16271                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16272                                  
 16273                                  ; set_volume_id
 16274                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 16275                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 16276                                  ;
 16277                                  ;   on entry:
 16278                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 16279                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 16280                                  ;
 16281                                  ;   on exit:
 16282                                  ;	carry clear:
 16283                                  ;	   successful call
 16284                                  ;	carry set
 16285                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 16286                                  
 16287                                  set_volume_id:				
 16288 00001967 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 16289 00001968 50                      		push	ax
 16290 00001969 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 16291 0000196C 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 16292 0000196E E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 16293 00001971 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 16294 00001973 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 16295 00001976 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 16296                                  setvret:				
 16297                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16298                                  		; cf = 0
 16299                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 16300 00001979 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 16301 0000197A 5A                      		pop	dx
 16302 0000197B C3                      		retn
 16303                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16304                                  
 16305                                  seterr:					
 16306 0000197C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 16307 0000197D 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 16308 0000197E C3                      		retn
 16309                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16310 0000197F 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 16311                                  
 16312                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16313                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 16314                                  ; 09/12/2022
 16315                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 16316                                  
 16317                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16318                                  
 16319                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16320                                  
 16321                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 16322                                  ;
 16323                                  ;   on entry:
 16324                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 16325                                  ;
 16326                                  ;   on exit:
 16327                                  ;	carry clear
 16328                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 16329                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 16330                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 16331                                  ;
 16332                                  ;	carry set:
 16333                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 16334                                  
 16335                                  read_volume_id:
 16336 00001981 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 16337 00001982 51                      		push	cx
 16338 00001983 53                      		push	bx
 16339 00001984 50                      		push	ax
 16340 00001985 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 16341 00001986 57                      		push	di
 16342 00001987 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 16343 00001988 07                      		pop	es
 16344 00001989 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16345 0000198C BE[9508]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16346                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 16347 0000198F B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 16348 00001992 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16349 00001994 5F                      		pop	di
 16350 00001995 07                      		pop	es
 16351 00001996 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 16352                                  					; # of fats
 16353 0000199A 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 16354                                  					; sectors / fat
 16355 0000199E F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 16356 000019A0 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 16357                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 16358                                  					;
 16359                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 16360                                  		; 17/10/2022
 16361 000019A4 2EA3[7F19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 16362                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 16363                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 16364 000019A8 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 16365                                  					; # root dir entries
 16366 000019AC B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 16367 000019AE D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 16368                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 16369                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 16370 000019B0 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 16371                                  next_sec:
 16372 000019B1 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 16373 000019B2 2EA1[7F19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 16374                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 16375                                  					; get sector #
 16376 000019B6 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 16377                                  					; sectors / track
 16378 000019BA 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 16379 000019BC F7F1                    		div	cx
 16380                                  
 16381                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 16382                                  
 16383 000019BE 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 16384                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 16385 000019BF 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 16386 000019C1 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 16387 000019C3 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 16388                                  					; # heads on this disc
 16389 000019C7 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 16390 000019C9 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 16391 000019CB E83CEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 16392                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 16393 000019CE 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 16394 000019D0 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 16395 000019D3 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 16396                                  fvid_loop:
 16397                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16398 000019D5 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 16399                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 16400 000019D7 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 16401 000019D9 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 16402 000019DC 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 16403 000019DE 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 16404 000019E1 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 16405                                  ent_loop:
 16406 000019E3 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 16407 000019E6 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 16408 000019E8 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 16409 000019E9 2EFF06[7F19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 16410                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 16411                                  					; next sector
 16412 000019EE E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 16413                                  notfound:
 16414                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16415                                  		;xor	si, si
 16416 000019F0 EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16417                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16418                                  
 16419                                  found_vid:
 16420                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16421                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 16422 000019F2 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16423 000019F3 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 16424 000019F5 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 16425 000019F6 57                      		push	di
 16426 000019F7 1E                      		push	ds
 16427 000019F8 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 16428 000019F9 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16429 000019FC B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 16430                                  					; length of string minus nul
 16431 000019FF F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 16432                                  		;xor	al, al
 16433                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16434 00001A01 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 16435 00001A02 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 16436                                  		;;xor	si, si
 16437                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16438                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 16439 00001A03 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 16440 00001A04 07                      		pop	es
 16441                                  fvid_ret:
 16442                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16443 00001A05 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 16444                                  				
 16445 00001A07 58                      		pop	ax
 16446                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16447                                  		; cf = 0
 16448                                  		;clc
 16449                                  rvidret:
 16450 00001A08 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 16451 00001A09 59                      		pop	cx
 16452 00001A0A 5A                      		pop	dx
 16453 00001A0B C3                      		retn
 16454                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16455                                  
 16456                                  no_vid:
 16457 00001A0C 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16458                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 16459                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16460 00001A0D EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16461                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16462                                  
 16463                                  readviderr:
 16464 00001A0F 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 16465 00001A10 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 16466 00001A11 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 16467                                  
 16468                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16469                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 16470                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 16471                                  preset_volid_addr:
 16472 00001A13 BE[A108]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 16473                                  		;
 16474                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 16475                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 16476                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 16477                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 16478 00001A16 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16479 00001A19 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16480                                  		;
 16481 00001A1C FC                      		cld
 16482 00001A1D C3                      		retn
 16483                                  
 16484                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16485                                  
 16486                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16487                                  ;
 16488                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 16489                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 16490

 16493                                  		;push	si
 16494 00001A1F 51                      		push	cx
 16495                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16496 00001A20 56                      		push	si
 16497                                  
 16498                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16499                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16500                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16501                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16502                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16503                                  		;cld
 16504                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16505 00001A21 E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16506                                  
 16507 00001A24 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16508                                  		
 16509                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16510 00001A26 5E                      		pop	si
 16511                                  chk_volid_ok:
 16512 00001A27 59                      		pop	cx
 16513                                  		;pop	si
 16514 00001A28 5F                      		pop	di
 16515 00001A29 C3                      		retn

 16517                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16518                                  
 16519                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 16520                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 16521                                  ;
 16522                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 16523                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 16524                                  
 16525                                  check_volume_id:
 16526 00001A2A 57                      		push	di
 16527 00001A2B 51                      		push	cx
 16528                                  		
 16529                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16530                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16531                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16532                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16533                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16534                                  		;cld
 16535                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16536 00001A2C E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16537                                  
 16538 00001A2F F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 16539                                  		
 16540                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16541                                  		;pop	cx
 16542                                  		;pop	di
 16543                                  		;retn
 16544 00001A31 EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok

 16546                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16547                                  
 16548                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16549                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 16550                                  ;
 16551                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 16552                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 16553                                  ;
 16554                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 16555                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 16556                                  ;
 16557                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 16558                                  
 16559                                  fat_check:
 16560 00001A33 50                      		push	ax
 16561 00001A34 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 16562 00001A36 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 16563 00001A39 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 16564                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 16565 00001A3D 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 16566 00001A3F 4E                      		dec	si
 16567                                  okret1:
 16568 00001A40 58                      		pop	ax
 16569 00001A41 C3                      		retn
