 33275                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33276                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 33277                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33278                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 33279                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 33280                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33281                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 33282                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33283                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 33284                                  ;
 33285                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 33286                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 33287                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 33288                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 33289                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 33290                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 33291                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 33292                                  ;       Endif
 33293                                  ;    Endif
 33294                                  ; Endif
 33295                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 33296                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 33297                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 33298                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 33299                                  ;    ENDIF
 33300                                  ; ENDIF
 33301                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33302                                  
 33303                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33304                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 33305                                  _hideUMB_:
 33306                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33307                                  	; ds = cs
 33308                                  
 33309                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33310                                  	;push	bx
 33311                                  	;push	dx
 33312 00002E05 06                      	push	es
 33313                                  
 33314 00002E06 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 33315 00002E08 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 33316 00002E0B 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 33317                                  
 33318 00002E0D 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 33319 00002E0F E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 33320 00002E12 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 33321                                  
 33322 00002E14 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 33323 00002E15 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 33324 00002E17 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 33325 00002E1A 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 33326                                  
 33327 00002E1B 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 33328 00002E1D 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 33329                                  
 33330 00002E1F 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 33331 00002E21 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 33332                                  
 33333 00002E23 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 33334 00002E25 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 33335 00002E28 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 33336                                  hu_10:	
 33337                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 33338                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 33339                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33340                                  ;isTiny:
 33341                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 33342                                  	;or	al,al
 33343 00002E2A 800E[261F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 33344 00002E2F 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 33345                                  
 33346 00002E31 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 33347 00002E34 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 33348                                  
 33349 00002E36 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 33350 00002E38 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 33351                                  
 33352 00002E3A 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 33353 00002E3C E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 33354 00002E3F 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 33355                                  
 33356 00002E41 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33357                                  hu_30:	
 33358 00002E43 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 33359                                  
 33360 00002E45 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 33361                                  
 33362 00002E48 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 33363 00002E4A 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 33364                                  
 33365 00002E4C 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 33366 00002E4E E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 33367                                  hu_X:	
 33368 00002E51 07                      	pop	es
 33369                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33370                                  	;pop	dx
 33371                                  	;pop	bx
 33372 00002E52 C3                      	retn
 33373                                  
 33374                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33375                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 33376                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33377                                  ; Entry:  None
 33378                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 33379                                  ; Error:  None
 33380                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 33381                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33382                                  
 33383                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33384                                  UnFreeze:

 33386                                  	;push	ax
 33387 00002E53 06                      	push	es
 33388                                  
 33389 00002E54 E8D5FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 33390 00002E57 721C                    	jc	short ufX
 33391                                  
 33392                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33393                                  uf10:
 33394 00002E59 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 33395                                  
 33396                                  ; ------------------------------
 33397                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 33398                                  ; ------------------------------
 33399                                  
 33400                                  ;uf10:

 33596                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33597                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 33598                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33599                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 33600                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 33601                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33602                                  ; USES:     Flags

 33605                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)

 33709                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33710                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 33711                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33712                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 33713                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 33714                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 33715                                  ; ERROR:  None
 33716                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 33717                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33718                                  
 33719                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)

 33722                                  UnHideUMBs:
 33723 00002F36 50                      	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 33724

 33726                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 33727                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 33728                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 33729                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 33730                                  ;    every command execution.

 33748

 33750 00002F3F F9                      	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 33751 00002F40 C3                      	retn			; that.

 33754 00002F44 E81200                  	call	FreeUMBs

 33811                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33812                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 33813                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33814                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 33815                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 33816                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)

 33820                                  FreeUMBs:
 33821 00002F59 50                      	push	ax
 33822 00002F5A 06                      	push	es
 33823                                  
 33824 00002F5B E86700                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 33825 00002F5E 721C                    	jc	short fusX
 33826                                  fus10:
 33827 00002F60 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 33828                                  ;fus10:	
 33829 00002F62 E81A00                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 33830 00002F65 7505                    	jnz	short fus20
 33831 00002F67 E84000                  	call	freeMCB
 33832                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33833                                  	; ax <> es
 33834 00002F6A 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33835                                  fus20:	   
 33836                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33837                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33838                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33839 00002F6C 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33840 00002F72 7408                    	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 33841                                  	
 33842                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33843                                  	; ax = es
 33844                                  	;mov	ax,es
 33845 00002F74 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33846 00002F79 40                      	inc	ax
 33847                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33848                                  	;mov	es,ax
 33849 00002F7A EBE4                    	jmp	short fus10	; Go on forward.
 33850                                  fusX:	
 33851 00002F7C 07                      	pop	es
 33852 00002F7D 58                      	pop	ax
 33853 00002F7E C3                      	retn
 33854                                  
 33855                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33856                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 33857                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33858                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 33859                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 33860                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33861                                  ; USES:     Flags
 33862                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33863                                  
 33864                                  isHideMCB:
 33865                                  	;push	ax
 33866                                  
 33867 00002F7F 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 33868 00002F85 7522                    	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 33869                                  
 33870                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 33871                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 33872 00002F87 26813E08004849          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 33873 00002F8E 7519                    	jne	short ihm_x
 33874                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 33875                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 33876 00002F90 26813E0A004444          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 33877 00002F97 7510                    	jne	short ihm_x
 33878                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 33879                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 33880 00002F99 26813E0C00454E          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 33881 00002FA0 7507                    	jne	short ihm_x
 33882                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 33883                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 33884 00002FA2 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 33885                                  ihm_x:	
 33886                                  	;pop	ax
 33887 00002FA9 C3                      	retn

 33902 00002FB8 26A30A00                	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 33903 00002FBC 26A30C00                	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 33904 00002FC0 26A30E00                	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 33905 00002FC4 C3                      	retn

 33923

 33926                                  
 33927 00002FC5 B452                    	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...

 33948                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33949                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 33950                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33951                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 33952                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 33953                                  ; ERROR:    None

 33957                                  linkumb:

 33965 00002FDE BB0100                  	mov	bx,1

 33981                                  ;
 33982                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 33983                                  ;
 33984                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 33985                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 33986                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 33987                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 33988                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 33989                                  ;
 33990                                  ;	Output : none
 33991                                  ;
 33992                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 33993                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 33994                                  ;
 33995                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33996                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 33997                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 33998                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 33999                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 34000                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34001                                  
 34002                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34003                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34004                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 34005                                  InitDevLoad:
 34006                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34007                                  	;push	es ; *
 34008                                  
 34009                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34010                                  	; ds = cs
 34011 00002FE4 803E[7B1F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 34012                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 34013                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 34014 00002FE9 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 34015                                  
 34016                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34017                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34018                                  ; %if 0
 34019                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34020 00002FEB 803E[6B1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 34021                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 34022 00002FF0 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 34023                                  
 34024                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 34025                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 34026                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 34027                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 34028                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 34029                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 34030                                  
 34031 00002FF2 E85704                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 34032                                  
 34033 00002FF5 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 34034 00002FF8 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 34035 00002FFB E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 34036 00002FFE 9C                      	pushf
 34037 00002FFF E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 34038 00003002 9D                      	popf
 34039                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 34040                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 34041                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34042 00003003 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 34043                                  
 34044                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 34045                                  
 34046                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34047                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 34048                                  InitForConv:
 34049                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34050                                  	; ds = cs
 34051 00003005 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 34052                                  					;  current UMB ?
 34053 00003008 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 34054 0000300A E83F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 34055 0000300D E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 34056                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 34057 00003010 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 34058                                  					;  in low memory
 34059                                  InitForHi:
 34060                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34061                                  	; ds = cs
 34062                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 34063                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 34064                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 34065 00003012 A1[711F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 34066 00003015 8B16[6D1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34067 00003019 0316[6F1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 34068 0000301D EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 34069                                  
 34070                                  InitForLo:
 34071                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34072                                  	; ds = cs
 34073                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 34074 0000301F C606[7B1F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 34075                                  initforlo_x:
 34076                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34077                                  	; ds = cs
 34078                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 34079                                  					;  we are loading low
 34080                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 34081                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 34082 00003024 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 34083 00003027 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 34084                                  idl1:
 34085 0000302B E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 34086                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34087                                  	; ds = cs
 34088                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 34089                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 34090                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 34091                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 34092 0000302E A3[5F1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 34093 00003031 8916[611F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 34094 00003035 C706[631F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 34095 0000303B A3[651F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 34096                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34097                                  	;pop	es ; *
 34098 0000303E C3                      	retn
 34099                                  
 34100                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34101                                  ;
 34102                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 34103                                  ;
 34104                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 34105                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 34106                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 34107                                  ;		   current UMB
 34108                                  ;
 34109                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34110                                  
 34111                                  SpaceInUMB:
 34112                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34113                                  	; ds = cs
 34114                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 34115                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 34116                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 34117 0000303F A1[6F1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 34118 00003042 0306[6D1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 34119 00003046 2B06[711F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 34120                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34121                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 34122                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 34123                                  	;stc
 34124                                  	;retn
 34125                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34126 0000304A 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 34127 0000304D 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 34128                                  spcinumb1:
 34129 0000304F 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 34130                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34131                                  	; ds = cs
 34132 00003050 3B06[5D1F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 34133                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 34134                                  spcinumb2:
 34135 00003054 C3                      	retn
 34136                                  
 34137                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34138                                  ;
 34139                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 34140                                  ;
 34141                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 34142                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 34143                                  ;
 34144                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34145                                  
 34146                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34147                                  ;
 34148                                  ;PrepareMark:
 34149                                  ;	push	ds
 34150                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 34151                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 34152                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 34153                                  ;	pop	ds
 34154                                  ;
 34155                                  ;	inc	ax
 34156                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 34157                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 34158                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 34159                                  ;	retn
 34160                                  
 34161                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34162                                  ;
 34163                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 34164                                  ;
 34165                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 34166                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 34167                                  ;		 the device.
 34168                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 34169                                  ;
 34170                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 34171                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 34172                                  ;	UMB.
 34173                                  ;
 34174                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 34175                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 34176                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 34177                                  ;
 34178                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34179                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34180                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 34181                                  
 34182                                  GetUMBForDev:
 34183                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34184                                  	; ds = cs
 34185 00003055 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 34186 00003058 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 34187 0000305B CD21                    	int	21h
 34188                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 34189                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 34190                                  
 34191 0000305D 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 34192                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 34193                                  	; 09/09/2023

 34795                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34796                                  ;
 34797                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 34798                                  ;
 34799                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 34800                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 34801                                  ;
 34802                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 34803                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 34804                                  ;
 34805                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 34806                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 34807                                  ;
 34808                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34809                                  
 34810                                  ; 13/05/2019
 34811                                  
 34812                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34813                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 34814                                  
 34815                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34816                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 34817                                  GetHexNum:
 34818 00003218 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 34819 0000321A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 34820                                  ghn_next:
 34821 0000321C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 34822 0000321F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 34823 00003222 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 34824 00003224 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 34825 00003227 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 34826 00003229 50                      	push	ax
 34827 0000322A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 34828 0000322C E8D80F                  	call	delim
 34829 0000322F 58                      	pop	ax
 34830                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34831 00003230 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 34832 00003233 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 34833 00003235 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 34834                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 34835                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34836 00003238 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 34837                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34838                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34839                                  ghn_shift1:
 34840 0000323A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 34841 0000323C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 34842 0000323E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 34843 00003240 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 34844 00003242 46                      	inc	si
 34845 00003243 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 34846                                  ghn_into_paras:
 34847 00003245 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 34848 00003248 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 34849 0000324B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 34850 0000324F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 34851                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34852                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34853                                  ghn_shift2:
 34854 00003251 F8                      	clc
 34855 00003252 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 34856 00003254 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 34857 00003256 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 34858 00003258 F8                      	clc
 34859 00003259 C3                      	retn
 34860                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34861                                  ghn_err:
 34862                                  gnib_err:
 34863 0000325A F9                      	stc
 34864                                  ghn_ret:
 34865                                  gnib_ret:
 34866 0000325B C3                      	retn

 34870                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 34871                                  ;
 34872                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 34873                                  ;
 34874                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 34875                                  ;
 34876                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 34877                                  ;
 34878                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34879                                  
 34880                                  GetNibble:
 34881 0000325C 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 34882                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34883                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34884 0000325F 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34885 00003261 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 34886 00003264 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 34887 00003266 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 34888 00003269 C3                      	retn
 34889                                  is_it_hex:
 34890 0000326A 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 34891                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34892                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34893 0000326D 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34894 0000326F 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 34895 00003272 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 34896 00003274 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 34897 00003277 C3                      	retn

 34901                                  ;	stc

 34918                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34919                                  ;
 34920                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34921                                  ;
 34922                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34923                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34924                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34925                                  ;			; DS = data
 34926                                  ;
 34927                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34928                                  ;
 34929                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34930                                  ;
 34931                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34932                                  
 34933                                  umb_insert:
 34934 00003278 1E                      	push	ds
 34935                                  
 34936                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34937                                  	; ds = cs
 34938                                  
 34939                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34940 00003279 8E1E[8A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34941                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34942 0000327D 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34943 00003281 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34944 00003283 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34945                                  ui_next:
 34946 00003285 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34947                                  					;    new block
 34948 00003287 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34949                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34950                                  					;    last
 34951 00003289 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34952 0000328F 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34953                                  					; N: get next block
 34954 00003291 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34955                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34956 00003293 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34957 00003296 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 34958                                  
 34959                                  ui_insert:
 34960 00003298 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 34961 0000329A 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 34962                                  
 34963 0000329B 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 34964 0000329D F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 34965                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 34966 0000329F C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34967                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 34968 000032A4 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34969                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 34970 000032AA 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 34971                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 34972 000032AE C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34973                                  
 34974                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34975                                  
 34976 000032B4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34977 000032B6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34978 000032BC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 34979                                  					; mark as free
 34980 000032C3 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 34981                                  					; start & end of new block
 34982 000032C6 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 34983                                  
 34984                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 34985                                  	
 34986 000032CB 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 34987 000032CD 43                      	inc	bx
 34988 000032CE 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 34989 000032D0 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 34990                                  
 34991                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 34992                                  					; this block
 34993 000032D1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 34994                                  	
 34995 000032D3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34996 000032D9 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34997 000032E0 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34998 000032E4 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34999                                  
 35000 000032EB EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 35001                                  
 35002                                  ui_append:
 35003                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 35004 000032ED 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 35005 000032F2 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 35006                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 35007                                  					; block for the next arena.
 35008                                  	; 13/05/2019
 35009 000032F8 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35010                                  
 35011 000032FE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 35012 00003300 40                      	inc	ax
 35013 00003301 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 35014                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 35015 00003303 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 35016                                  
 35017 00003305 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 35018                                  
 35019 00003307 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35020 0000330D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35021 00003314 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35022 00003318 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 35023                                  
 35024                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 35025 0000331F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 35026 00003321 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 35027 00003327 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 35028                                  					; mark as free
 35029 0000332E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 35030 0000332F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 35031                                  ui_done:
 35032                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 35033 00003334 1F                      	pop	ds
 35034                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 35035                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35036                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 35037 00003335 C3                      	retn

 35056 00003343 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 35057                                  au_coalesce:

 35059                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs

 35063                                  ;	retn

 35066                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce

 35068                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35069                                  
 35070                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35071                                  
 35072                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35073                                  ;
 35074                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 35075                                  ;
 35076                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 35077                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 35078                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 35079                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 35080                                  ;
 35081                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 35082                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 35083                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 35084                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 35085                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 35086                                  ;
 35087                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35088                                  
 35089                                  umb_coalesce:
 35090                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35091                                  	; ds = cs
 35092 00003345 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 35093                                  
 35094 00003346 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 35095                                  
 35096                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 35097                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35098 00003348 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 35099 0000334C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 35100                                  uc_nextfree:
 35101 00003351 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 35102 00003353 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 35103                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 35104 00003355 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 35105 0000335A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 35106                                  					; N: get next arena
 35107 0000335C E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 35108 0000335F 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 35109 00003361 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 35110                                  uc_again:
 35111 00003363 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 35112 00003366 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 35113                                  uc_check:
 35114 00003368 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 35115 0000336D 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 35116                                  					; Y: coalesce
 35117 0000336F 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 35118 00003374 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 35119                                  	;add	[3],cx
 35120 00003375 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 35121 00003379 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 35122 0000337C 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 35123 0000337E EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 35124                                  
 35125                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35126                                  ;uc_done:
 35127                                  	;retn

 35176                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35177                                  ;
 35178                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 35179                                  ;
 35180                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 35181                                  ;
 35182                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 35183                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 35184                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 35185                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 35186                                  ;				NC
 35187                                  ;			  else 
 35188                                  ;				CY
 35189                                  ;
 35190                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 35191                                  ;
 35192                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35193                                  
 35194                                  umb_allocate:
 35195                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35196                                  	; ds = cs
 35197 000033AE 50                      	push	ax
 35198 000033AF B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 35199 000033B1 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 35200                                  					;   possible
 35201                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35202 000033B4 FF1E[731F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 35203                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 35204                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 35205                                  					; the largest UMB
 35206 000033B8 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 35207 000033BA 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 35208                                  	
 35209 000033BC B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 35210                                  
 35211                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35212 000033BE FF1E[731F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 35213                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 35214                                  
 35215 000033C2 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 35216                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 35217                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 35218 000033C5 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 35219                                  ua_err:
 35220 000033C7 F9                      	stc	
 35221                                  
 35222                                  	;clc
 35223                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35224                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35225                                  	; cf=0
 35226                                  	;clc 
 35227                                  ua_done:
 35228 000033C8 58                      	pop	ax
 35229 000033C9 C3                      	retn
 35230                                  	; 27/07/2023
 35231                                  ;ua_err:
 35232                                  	;stc
 35233                                  	;jmp	short ua_done
 35234                                  
 35235                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35236                                  ;
 35237                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 35238                                  ;
 35239                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 35240                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 35241                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 35242                                  ;
 35243                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35244                                  
 35245                                  	; 01/11/2022
 35246                                  get_next:
 35247 000033CA 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35248 000033CF 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 35249                                  _get_next_:
 35250 000033D1 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 35251 000033D3 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 35252 000033D7 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 35253 000033D8 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35254                                  	;clc
 35255                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35256                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35257                                  	; cf=0
 35258                                  	;clc
 35259 000033DA C3                      	retn
 35260                                  gn_err:
 35261 000033DB F9                      	stc
 35262                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 35263                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 35264 000033DC C3                      	retn

 35266                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35267                                  ;
 35268                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 35269                                  ;
 35270                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35271                                  
 35272                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35273                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 35274                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 35275                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35276                                  	; ds = cs
 35277 000033DD E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate
 35278 000033E0 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 35279                                  
 35280                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 35281                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 35282                                  
 35283                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35284                                  	; ds = cs
 35285                                  
 35286 000033E2 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 35287 000033E4 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 35288 000033E6 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 35289                                  
 35290 000033E8 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 35291 000033EA 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 35292                                  
 35293 000033EC F7D8                    	neg	ax
 35294                                  
 35295                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 35296                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35297 000033EE 49                      	dec	cx
 35298 000033EF 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 35299                                  	
 35300 000033F1 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35301 000033F7 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35302                                  					
 35303 000033FE 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35304 00003402 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35305                                  
 35306                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 35307                                  
 35308 00003409 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 35309 0000340B 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35310 00003411 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 35311                                  					; mark as free 
 35312 00003418 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 35313 00003419 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 35314                                  
 35315                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 35316                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35317 0000341E 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 35318                                  	; 18/09/2023
 35319 00003422 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx
 35320                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 35321                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 35322                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 35323                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 35324                                  
 35325                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 35326                                  
 35327                                  	;mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 35328                                  	;mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 35329                                  	; 18/09/2023
 35330 00003427 268E062400              	mov	es,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 35331 0000342C 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 35332                                  ;scan_next
 35333                                  ; 09/12/2022
 35334                                  scannext:
 35335 0000342E 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 35336 00003432 740C                    	je	short got_last
 35337                                  	
 35338 00003434 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 35339 00003436 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 35340 0000343B 40                      	inc	ax
 35341 0000343C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35342                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 35343                                  	; 09/12/2022
 35344 0000343E EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 35345                                  got_last:
 35346                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 35347                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35348 00003440 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 35349                                  
 35350 00003445 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35351                                  	;clc
 35352                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35353                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35354                                  	; cf=0
 35355                                  	;clc
 35356 0000344B C3                      	retn
 35357                                  
 35358                                  ; 11/12/2022
 35359                                  ;;lfu_err:
 35360                                  ;	;stc
 35361                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35362                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 35363                                  ;	; cf=1
 35364                                  ;	;stc
 35365                                  ;	retn

 35368                                  ;
 35369                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 35370                                  ;
 35371                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 35372                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 35373                                  ;
 35374                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35375                                  
 35376                                  ShrinkUMB:
 35377                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35378                                  	; ds = cs
 35379 0000344C 833E[6D1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 35380                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 35381 00003451 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 35382 00003453 06                      	push	es
 35383                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35384                                  	;push	bx
 35385                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35386                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 35387                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 35388                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 35389 00003454 8B1E[711F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 35390 00003458 2B1E[6D1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 35391 0000345C 8E06[6D1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 35392                                  	
 35393 00003460 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 35394 00003463 CD21                    	int	21h
 35395                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 35396                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 35397                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 35398 00003465 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 35399 00003467 48                      	dec	ax
 35400 00003468 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35401 0000346A 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 35402                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35403                                  	;pop	bx
 35404 00003471 07                      	pop	es
 35405                                  su_exit:
 35406 00003472 C3                      	retn

 35412                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 35413                                  ;
 35414                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35415                                  
 35416                                  UnlinkUMB:
 35417                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35418                                  	; ds = cs
 35419 00003473 1E                      	push	ds
 35420 00003474 06                      	push	es
 35421                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35422 00003475 803E[891F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 35423                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 35424 0000347A 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 35425                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35426 0000347C 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 35427                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 35428 00003480 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 35429 00003485 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 35430                                  ulu_next:
 35431 0000348A E83DFF                  	call	get_next
 35432 0000348D 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 35433 0000348F 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 35434 00003491 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 35435 00003493 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 35436 00003495 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 35437                                  ulu_found:
 35438                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 35439 00003497 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35440                                  ulu_x:
 35441 0000349C 07                      	pop	es
 35442 0000349D 1F                      	pop	ds
 35443 0000349E C3                      	retn

 35445                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 35446                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 35447                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 35448                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35449                                  
 35450                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35451                                  ;
 35452                                  ; Summary:
 35453                                  ;
 35454                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 35455                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 35456                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 35457                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 35458                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 35459                                  ;
 35460                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 35461                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 35462                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 35463                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 35464                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 35465                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 35466                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 35467                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 35468                                  ;
 35469                                  ; Example:
 35470                                  ;
 35471                                  ;   [menu]
 35472                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 35473                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 35474                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 35475                                  ;
 35476                                  ;   [network]
 35477                                  ;   include misc
 35478                                  ;   device=foo
 35479                                  ;
 35480                                  ;   [misc]
 35481                                  ;   device=bar
 35482                                  ;   include alternate
 35483                                  ;
 35484                                  ;   [alternate]
 35485                                  ;   device=tar
 35486                                  ;
 35487                                  ;
 35488                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 35489                                  ;
 35490                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 35491                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 35492                                  ;
 35493                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 35494                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 35495                                  ;   following order:
 35496                                  ;
 35497                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 35498                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 35499                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 35500                                  ;
 35501                                  
 35502                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 35503                                  
 35504                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 35505                                  
 35506                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 35507                                  
 35508                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 35509                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 35510                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 35511                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 35512                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 35513                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 35514                                  
 35515                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35516                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35517                                  
 35518                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 35519                                  
 35520                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35521                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 35522                                  
 35523 0000349F 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 35527                                  ; procedure : setparms
 35528                                  ;
 35529                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 35530                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 35531                                  ;
 35532                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35533                                  
 35534                                  setparms:
 35535 000034A0 1E                      	push	ds
 35536 000034A1 50                      	push	ax
 35537 000034A2 53                      	push	bx
 35538 000034A3 51                      	push	cx
 35539 000034A4 52                      	push	dx
 35540                                  
 35541 000034A5 0E                      	push	cs
 35542 000034A6 1F                      	pop	ds
 35543                                  
 35544 000034A7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 35545 000034A9 8A1E[5B49]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 35546                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35547 000034AD 43                      	inc	bx
 35548                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 35549                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 35550 000034AE BA[3348]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 35551                                  	;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 35552                                  	;mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 35553                                  	; 04/07/2023
 35554 000034B1 B80D44                  	mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8)|GENERIC_IOCTL
 35555                                  	;mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 35556                                  	;mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 35557                                  	; 04/07/2023
 35558 000034B4 B94008                  	mov	cx,(RAWIO<<8)|SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS 
 35559 000034B7 CD21                    	int	21h
 35560                                  
 35561                                  ; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 35562 000034B9 8A26[5C49]              	mov	ah,[switches]
 35563                                  	;mov	al,[deviceparameters+20]
 35564 000034BD A0[4748]                	mov	al,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 35565 000034C0 8A0E[5B49]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 35566                                  ;
 35567                                  ;; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35568                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 35569                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 35570                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 35571                                  ;	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 35572                                  ;	;mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 35573                                  ;
 35574                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 35575                                  ;	;;test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 35576                                  ;	;test	byte [cs:switches],flagec35
 35577                                  ;	;jz	short not_ec35
 35578                                  ;
 35579                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 35580                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35581                                  ;	;;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 35582                                  ;	; 12/12/2022
 35583                                  ;	;test	byte [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 35584                                  ;	;jz	short eot_ok
 35585                                  ;	
 35586                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 35587                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35588                                  	;mov	cl,[drive]
 35589                                  	; 27/07/2023
 35590                                  	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 35591                                  	;mov	ds,ax
 35592                                  
 35593 000034C4 BA7000                  	mov	dx,DOSBIODATASEG
 35594 000034C7 8EDA                    	mov	ds,dx
 35595

 35597 000034CC 7408                    	jz	short not_ec35
 35598

 35600                                  	;shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 35601                                  	;;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 35602                                  	;or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags
 35603                                  	; 27/07/2023
 35604 000034CE B401                    	mov	ah,1
 35605 000034D0 D2E4                    	shl	ah,cl
 35606 000034D2 0826[2005]              	or	[ec35_flag],ah
 35607                                  
 35608                                  ; 07/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 35609                                  ;	MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYINIT:3EB0h	
 35610                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35611                                  not_ec35:

 35613                                  ;	sectors per track than any old ones.
 35614                                  
 35615                                  	; 27/07/2023
 35616                                  	;;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+20]

 35618

 35620 000034D6 3A06[2C01]              	cmp	al,[eot]

 35622 000034DC A2[2C01]                	mov	[eot],al
 35623                                  eot_ok:
 35624 000034DF 5A                      	pop	dx			; fix up all the registers
 35625 000034E0 59                      	pop	cx
 35626 000034E1 5B                      	pop	bx
 35627 000034E2 58                      	pop	ax
 35628 000034E3 1F                      	pop	ds ; 13/05/2019
 35629 000034E4 C3                      	retn

 35646 000034EE C606[3448]02            	mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_3INCH720KB ; 2
 35647                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+2],0
 35648 000034F3 C706[3548]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],0
