 35659                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35660                                  ;
 35661                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35662                                  ;
 35663                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35664                                  ;
 35665                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35666                                  
 35667                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35668                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35669                                  
 35670                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35671                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35672                                  parseline:
 35673                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35674                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35675                                  
 35676                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35677                                  
 35678                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35679                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35680                                  
 35681                                  nextswtch:
 35682                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35683                                  	je	short done_line
 35684                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35685                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35686                                  
 35687                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35688                                  
 35689                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35690                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35691                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 35692                                  	je	short getparm
 35693                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 35694                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35695                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35696                                  swterr:
 35697                                  	retn
 35698                                  
 35699                                  getparm:
 35700                                  	call	check_switch
 35701                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35702                                  	jc	short swterr
 35703                                  getnext:
 35704                                  	call	getchr
 35705                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35706                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35707                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35708                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 35709                                  ;swterr:
 35710                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35711                                  
 35712                                  done_line:
 35713                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35714                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 35715                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 35716                                  	jnz	short okay
 35717                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 35718                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35719                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35720                                  	retn
 35721                                  
 35722                                  okay:
 35723                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 35724                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 35725                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 35726                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 35727                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 35728                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35729                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35730                                  	; cf=0
 35731                                  	;clc
 35732                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 35733                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35734                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 35735                                  ;exitpl:
 35736                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35737                                  	; ds = cs
 35738                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35739                                  	retn
 35740                                  put_back:
 35741                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 35742                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 35743                                  	jmp	short done_line

 35747                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35748                                  ;
 35749                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 35750                                  ;
 35751                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 35752                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 35753                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 35754                                  ; error.
 35755                                  ;
 35756                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35757                                  
 35758                                  ; 09/09/2023
 35759                                  
 35760                                  err_swtch:
 35761 00003501 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 35762                                  err_check:
 35763 00003503 F9                      	stc
 35764                                  err_chk:
 35765                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 35766 00003504 C3                      	retn
 35767                                  
 35768                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35769                                  
 35770                                  check_switch:
 35771 00003505 E8240D                  	call	getchr
 35772                                  	;jc	short err_check
 35773 00003508 72FA                    	jc	short err_chk
 35774 0000350A 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 35775 0000350C 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 35776                                  	;jb	short err_check
 35777 0000350E 72F4                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35778 00003510 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 35779 00003512 77EF                    	ja	short err_check
 35780                                  
 35781 00003514 06                      	push	es
 35782                                  
 35783 00003515 0E                      	push	cs
 35784 00003516 07                      	pop	es
 35785                                  
 35786                                  	;mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 35787                                  	;mov	ch,0
 35788                                  	;mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 35789                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35790 00003517 BF[F049]                	mov	di,switchlist
 35791 0000351A 8A0D                    	mov	cl,[di]
 35792 0000351C B500                    	mov	ch,0
 35793 0000351E 47                      	inc	di	; 1+switchlist
 35794                                  
 35795 0000351F F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 35796                                  
 35797 00003521 07                      	pop	es
 35798 00003522 75DF                    	jnz	short err_check
 35799                                  
 35800 00003524 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 35801 00003527 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 35802 00003529 8B1E[5C49]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 35803 0000352D 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 35804 0000352F 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 35805                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35806 00003531 A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 35807                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 35808 00003533 74CF                    	jz	short done_swtch
 35809                                  
 35810 00003535 E8F40C                  	call	getchr
 35811 00003538 72C7                    	jc	short err_swtch
 35812                                  
 35813 0000353A 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 35814 0000353C 75C3                    	jne	short err_swtch
 35815                                  
 35816 0000353E E8EB0C                  	call	getchr
 35817 00003541 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 35818                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35819                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 35820                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35821                                  	; ds = cs
 35822 00003542 C606[AE02]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '
 35823 00003547 E8980D                  	call	getnum
 35824                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35825                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35826 0000354A C606[AE02]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 35827 0000354F 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 35828                                  
 35829                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 35830                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 35831                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 35832                                  
 35833                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35834                                  	;call	process_num
 35835                                  	;jmp	short process_num
 35836                                  
 35837                                  ;done_swtch:
 35838                                  ;	;clc
 35839                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35840                                  ;	; 12/12/2022
 35841                                  ;	; cf=0
 35842                                  ;	;clc
 35843                                  ;	retn

 35846                                  ;
 35847                                  ; procedure : process_num
 35848                                  ;
 35849                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 35850                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 35851                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 35852                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 35853                                  ;
 35854                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35855                                  
 35856                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35857                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 35858                                  process_num:
 35859 00003550 850E[5C49]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 35860 00003554 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 35861                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35862 00003556 F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 35863                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 35864 00003559 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 35865 0000355B A2[5B49]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 35866                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35867                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35868                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35869                                  	; cf=0
 35870 0000355E C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35871                                  try_f:
 35872                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35873 0000355F F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 35874                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 35875 00003562 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 35876                                  
 35877                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 35878                                  
 35879                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 35880 00003564 A2[3448]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 35881                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35882                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35883                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35884                                  	; cf=0
 35885 00003567 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35886                                  try_t:
 35887 00003568 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 35888 0000356A 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 35889                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35890 0000356C F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 35891                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 35892 0000356F 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 35893                                  
 35894                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+4],ax
 35895 00003571 A3[3748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],ax
 35896                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35897                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35898                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35899                                  	; cf=0
 35900 00003574 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35901                                  try_s:
 35902                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35903 00003575 F6C120                  	test	cl,flagseclim ; 20h
 35904                                  	;test	cx,flagseclim ; 20h
 35905 00003578 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 35906 0000357A A3[5949]                	mov	[slim],ax
 35907                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35908                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35909                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35910                                  	; cf=0
 35911 0000357D C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35912                                  
 35913                                  ; must be for number of heads
 35914                                  
 35915                                  try_h:
 35916 0000357E A3[5749]                	mov	[hlim],ax
 35917                                  done_ret:
 35918                                  	;clc
 35919                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35920                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35921                                  	; cf=0 (test instruction resets cf)
 35922                                  	;clc
 35923 00003581 C3                      	retn

 35933                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35934                                  ;
 35935                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35936                                  ;
 35937                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35938                                  
 35939                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35940                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35941                                  
 35942                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35943                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35944                                  parseline:
 35945                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35946                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35947                                  
 35948                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35949                                  
 35950                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35951                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35952                                  
 35953                                  nextswtch:
 35954 00003582 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35955 00003584 741C                    	je	short done_line
 35956 00003586 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35957 00003588 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35958                                  
 35959                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35960                                  
 35961 0000358A 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35962 0000358C 760F                    	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35963 0000358E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'
 35964 00003590 7402                    	je	short getparm
 35965 00003592 F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 35966                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35967                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35968                                  swterr:
 35969 00003593 C3                      	retn
 35970                                  
 35971                                  getparm:
 35972 00003594 E86EFF                  	call	check_switch
 35973 00003597 891E[5C49]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35974 0000359B 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 35975                                  getnext:
 35976 0000359D E88C0C                  	call	getchr
 35977                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35978                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35979                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35980 000035A0 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch
 35981                                  ;swterr:
 35982                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35983                                  
 35984                                  done_line:
 35985                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35986 000035A2 F606[5C49]08            	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 35987                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 35988 000035A7 750C                    	jnz	short okay
 35989 000035A9 F9                      	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 35990                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35991                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35992 000035AA C3                      	retn
 35993                                  
 35994                                  ;exitpl:
 35995                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35996                                  	; ds = cs
 35997                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 35998                                  	;retn
 35999                                  
 36000                                  put_back:
 36001 000035AB FF06[5603]              	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 36002 000035AF FF0E[5A03]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 36003 000035B3 EBED                    	jmp	short done_line
 36004                                  
 36005                                  okay:
 36006 000035B5 A1[5C49]                	mov	ax,[switches]
 36007 000035B8 83E003                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 36008 000035BB A3[3548]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 36009 000035BE C706[5948]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 36010                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 36011                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36012                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36013                                  	; cf=0
 36014                                  	;clc

 36023                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36024                                  ;
 36025                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 36026                                  ;
 36027                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 36028                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 36029                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 36030                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 36031                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 36032                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 36033                                  ;
 36034                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 36035                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 36036                                  ;
 36037                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 36038                                  ;
 36039                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36040                                  
 36041                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36042                                  
 36043                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36044                                  
 36045                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36046                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 36047                                  
 36048                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36049                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 36050                                  
 36051                                  setdeviceparameters:
 36052                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36053                                  	; ds = cs
 36054                                  
 36055 000035C4 06                      	push	es
 36056                                  
 36057 000035C5 0E                      	push	cs
 36058 000035C6 07                      	pop	es
 36059                                  
 36060 000035C7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 36061 000035C9 8A1E[3448]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 36062 000035CD 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 36063 000035D0 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 36064                                  
 36065 000035D2 C706[3748]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 36066                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 36067                                  got_80:
 36068 000035D8 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 36069 000035DA 8BB7[DC49]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 36070                                  
 36071                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 36072                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36073 000035DE BF[3A48]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 36074 000035E1 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 36075                                  	; 09/09/2023
 36076                                  	;mov	cx,59 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM A_BPB.size
 36077 000035E4 FC                      	cld
 36078                                  	;repe	movsb
 36079                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36080 000035E5 F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 36081                                  
 36082 000035E7 07                      	pop	es
 36083                                  
 36084                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36085 000035E8 F606[5C49]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 36086                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 36087 000035ED 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 36088                                  
 36089 000035EF A1[5949]                	mov	ax,[slim]
 36090                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 36091 000035F2 A3[4748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 36092                                  
 36093                                  see_heads:
 36094                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36095 000035F5 F606[5C49]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 36096                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 36097 000035FA 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 36098                                  
 36099 000035FC A1[5749]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 36100                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 36101 000035FF A3[4948]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 36102                                  
 36103                                  heads_not_altered:
 36104                                  
 36105                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 36106                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 36107                                  
 36108                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 36109                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36110                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 36111                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36112 00003602 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 36113 00003605 A2[3C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 36114                                  
 36115 00003608 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 36116                                  
 36117                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 36118                                  
 36119                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 36120                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36121 0000360A 8A3E[4448]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 36122                                  	
 36123                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36124                                  	; ax = 2
 36125 0000360E 3906[4948]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 36126                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 36127 00003612 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 36128                                  
 36129 00003614 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 36130                                  
 36131                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 36132                                  
 36133 00003616 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 36134                                  
 36135                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 36136                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 36137                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 36138                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 36139                                  
 36140                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 36141                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 36142                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 36143                                  
 36144 00003618 833E[4748]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 36145 0000361D 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 36146 0000361F 833E[3748]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 36147 00003624 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 36148                                  
 36149                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 36150                                  
 36151 00003626 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 36152                                  
 36153                                  ;	check for 320K
 36154                                  
 36155                                  not_144m:
 36156 00003628 833E[3748]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 36157 0000362D 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 36158 0000362F 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 36159 00003634 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 36160                                  
 36161 00003636 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 36162 00003638 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 36163                                  
 36164                                  only_one_head:
 36165                                  
 36166                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 36167                                  
 36168 0000363A 803E[3448]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 36169 0000363F 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 36170                                  
 36171                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 36172                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 36173                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 36174                                  
 36175 00003641 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 36176 00003643 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 36177                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36178 00003648 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 36179                                  
 36180 0000364A B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 36181                                  
 36182                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 36183                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 36184                                  
 36185                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 36186                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36187                                  	; ax = 2
 36188 0000364C 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 36189 0000364D A2[3C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 36190                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 36191                                  
 36192                                  got_correct_mediad:
 36193 00003650 881E[4448]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 36194                                  
 36195                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 36196                                  
 36197 00003654 A1[3748]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 36198 00003657 F726[4948]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 36199 0000365B F726[4748]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 36200 0000365F A3[4248]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 36201 00003662 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 36202                                  
 36203 00003663 C3                      	retn
 36204

 36672                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36673                                  	; ds = cs
 36674 00003829 803E[9F34]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 36675                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 36676 0000382E 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
 36677 00003830 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 36678 00003835 AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 36679                                  					; M051 - End
 36680                                  org1_brdg:
 36681 00003836 C606[9F34]00            	mov	byte [insert_blank],0 
 36682                                  	;mov	byte [cs:insert_blank],0 ; M051: clear blank indicator for 
 36683                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 36684 0000383B E93CFE                  	jmp	org1
 36685                                  
 36686                                  at_quote:

 36688                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0

 36700                                  ;
 36701                                  ; procedure : get2
 36702                                  ;
 36703                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36704                                  
 36705                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36706                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 36707                                  
 36708                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36709                                  	; (SYSINIT:4270h)

 36711 00003852 E304                    	jcxz	noget
 36712                                  	;
 36713                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36714                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 36715                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36716 00003854 26                      	es	
 36717 00003855 AC                      	lodsb
 36718                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 36719                                  	;inc	si
 36720                                  	;
 36721 00003856 49                      	dec	cx
 36722 00003857 C3                      	retn
 36723                                  noget:
 36724 00003858 59                      	pop	cx
 36725                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36726                                  	; ds = cs
 36727                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 36728                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 36729 00003859 893E[5603]              	mov	[count],di
 36730 0000385D 893E[5803]              	mov	[org_count],di
 36731 00003861 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36732                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 36733 00003863 8936[5A03]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 36734                                  
 36735                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36736

 36738

 36740                                  ;	retn
 36741                                  ;else

 36743                                  ;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 36744                                  ;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 36745                                  ;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 36746                                  
 36747 00003867 89F9                    	mov     cx,di
 36748 00003869 E9E300                  	jmp     menu_check
 36749                                  
 36750                                  ;endif

 36755                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36756                                  ;
 36757                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 36758                                  ;
 36759                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 36760                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 36761                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 36762                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 36763                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 36764                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 36765                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 36766                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 36767                                  ;
 36768                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36769                                  
 36770                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36771                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 36772                                  
 36773                                  skip_comment:
 36774 0000386C E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 36775                                  
 36776                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36777                                  	; ds = cs	
 36778                                  
 36779 0000386E 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 36780                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 36781 00003873 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 36782                                  
 36783 00003875 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 36784                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 36785 0000387A 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 36786                                  
 36787 0000387C 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36788                                  	
 36789 0000387F 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 36790                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 36791 00003883 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 36792                                  
 36793 00003885 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 36794                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 36795 0000388A 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36796                                  
 36797 0000388C 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 36798                                  	
 36799 00003890 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 36800                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 36801 00003894 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 36802                                  skip_cmmt:
 36803 00003896 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 36804 00003898 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36805 0000389B 46                      	inc	si
 36806 0000389C 49                      	dec	cx
 36807 0000389D 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 36808 0000389F 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36809                                  no_commt:
 36810 000038A1 C3                      	retn

 36820                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36821                                  ;
 36822                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 36823                                  ;
 36824                                  ;   INPUT
 36825                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36826                                  ;
 36827                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36828                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 36829                                  ;
 36830                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36831                                  ;       All
 36832                                  ;
 36833                                  ;   HISTORY
 36834                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36835                                  ;
 36836                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36837                                  
 36838                                  kbd_read:
 36839 000038A2 F606[FF46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 36840 000038A7 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 36841                                  
 36842 000038A9 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 36843 000038AA 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 36844 000038AC 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 36845                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 36846                                  kbd_loop:
 36847 000038AE B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 36848 000038B0 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 36849 000038B2 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 36850 000038B4 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36851 000038B6 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36852 000038B8 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36853 000038BA 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 36854 000038BC A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 36855                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 36856                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36857 000038BF 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 36858                                  
 36859 000038C4 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 36860 000038C6 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 36861                                  kbd_loopdone:
 36862 000038C8 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 36863                                  kbd_nodelay:
 36864 000038C9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 36865 000038CB B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36866 000038CD CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36867 000038CF A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36868 000038D1 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 36869 000038D3 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 36870 000038D4 43                              inc     bx
 36871                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 36872 000038D5 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36873                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 36874 000038DA B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 36875 000038DC CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36876 000038DE 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 36877 000038E0 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 36878 000038E2 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 36879                                  
 36880                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 36881 000038E4 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 36882 000038E7 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 36883                                  	
 36884 000038E9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36885 000038EC 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 36886                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 36887 000038EE BA[974B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 36888 000038F1 E8DD0B                          call    print
 36889                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 36890 000038F4 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 36891 000038F9 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 36892                                  kbd_notf5:
 36893                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 36894 000038FB 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 36895 000038FE 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 36896                                  
 36897 00003900 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36898 00003903 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 36899                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 36900 00003905 BA[D54B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 36901 00003908 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 36902 0000390B B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 36903 0000390D 881E[0347]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 36904                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 36905 00003911 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 36906 00003913 CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 36907 00003915 C606[0947]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 36908 0000391A 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 36909 0000391C 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 36910                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 36911 0000391E 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 36912 00003921 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 36913                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 36914 00003923 E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 36915 00003926 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 36916 00003927 C3                              retn			;
 36917                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 36918 00003928 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 36919 00003929 C3                              retn			;
 36920                                  
 36921                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36922                                  ;
 36923                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 36924                                  ;
 36925                                  ;   INPUT
 36926                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 36927                                  ;
 36928                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36929                                  ;       None
 36930                                  ;
 36931                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36932                                  ;       None
 36933                                  ;
 36934                                  ;   HISTORY
 36935                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36936                                  ;
 36937                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36938                                  
 36939                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36940                                  
 36941                                  set_numlock:
 36942                                          ; 04/01/2023
 36943                                  	;push	ax
 36944 0000392A 1E                              push    ds
 36945 0000392B 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 36946 0000392D 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 36947 0000392F 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 36948 00003932 2E3B06[724B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 36949 00003937 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 36950 00003939 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 36951 0000393E EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 36952                                  not_off:
 36953 00003940 2E3B06[704B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 36954 00003945 F9                              stc
 36955 00003946 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 36956 00003948 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 36957                                  set_done:
 36958 0000394D 1F                              pop     ds
 36959                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36960                                  	;pop	ax
 36961 0000394E C3                              retn
 36962                                  
 36963                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36964                                  
 36965                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36966                                  ;
 36967                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 36968                                  ;
 36969                                  ;   INPUT
 36970                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 36971                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 36972                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36973                                  ;
 36974                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36975                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 36976                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 36977                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 36978                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 36979                                  ;
 36980                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36981                                  ;       All
 36982                                  ;
 36983                                  ;   NOTES
 36984                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 36985                                  ;
 36986                                  ;   HISTORY
 36987                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36988                                  ;
 36989                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36990                                  
 36991                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36992                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 36993                                  
 36994                                  menu_check:
 36995                                  
 36996                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 36997                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 36998                                  
 36999 0000394F 51                              push    cx              ;
 37000 00003950 56                              push    si              ;
 37001 00003951 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 37002                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 37003 00003953 E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 37004 00003956 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 37005 00003958 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 37006 0000395A 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 37007 0000395C 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 37008 0000395D EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 37009                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 37010 0000395F 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 37011 00003961 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 37012 00003963 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 37013 00003965 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 37014 00003967 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 37015 0000396A 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 37016 0000396F EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 37017                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 37018 00003971 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 37019 00003973 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 37020                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 37021 00003975 E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 37022                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 37023 00003978 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 37024 0000397A 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 37025 0000397C 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 37026 0000397E 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 37027 00003980 E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 37028 00003983 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 37029 00003985 3A06[B91E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]	; 'N'
 37030 00003989 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 37031 0000398B 800E[FF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 37032 00003990 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 37033                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 37034 00003992 3A06[C51E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]	; 'F'
 37035 00003996 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 37036 00003998 800E[FF46]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 37037 0000399D EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 37038                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 37039 0000399F E8C306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37040 000039A2 EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 37041                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 37042 000039A4 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37043 000039A5 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37044                                  
 37045                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 37046                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 37047                                  
 37048 000039A6 F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37049 000039AB 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 37050                                  ;
 37051                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 37052                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 37053                                  ;
 37054 000039AD E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 37055 000039B0 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 37056 000039B2 E9EE01                          jmp	menu_abort
 37057                                  
 37058                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 37059                                  
 37060                                  menu_search:
 37061 000039B5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 37062 000039B7 BF[4447]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 37063 000039BA E80304                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 37064 000039BD 7337                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 37065 000039BF C606[3C47]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 37066 000039C4 E90C02                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 37067                                  
 37068                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 37069                                  
 37070                                  menu_color:
 37071 000039C7 51                      	push	cx              ;
 37072 000039C8 52                      	push	dx              ;
 37073                                  	;;mov	dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 37074                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37075                                  	;mov	dl,7 ; !*!
 37076 000039C9 E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number
 37077 000039CC 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh  ; !**!	; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 37078 000039CF 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 37079                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 37080                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 37081                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 37082                                  	;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 37083 000039D1 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023
 37084 000039D3 E83108                  	call	delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 37085 000039D6 750E                    	jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 37086 000039D8 E88F06                  	call	get_number	; get next number
 37087 000039DB 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 37088 000039DE 88DE                    	mov	dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 37089                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37090                                  	;and	dl,0Fh	; !**!	;
 37091 000039E0 B104                    	mov	cl,4            ;
 37092 000039E2 D2E3                    	shl	bl,cl           ;
 37093 000039E4 08DA                    	or	dl,bl           ;
 37094                                  check_color:
 37095 000039E6 38F5                    	cmp	ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 37096 000039E8 7503                    	jne	short set_color	; no
 37097 000039EA 80F208                  	xor	dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37098                                  set_color:
 37099 000039ED 8816[FA46]              	mov	[bMenuColor],dl ;
 37100 000039F1 5A                      	pop	dx              ;
 37101 000039F2 59                      	pop	cx              ;
 37102 000039F3 E9A900                  	jmp	menu_nextitem
 37103                                  
 37104                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 37105                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 37106                                  
 37107                                  menu_found:
 37108 000039F6 C606[0447]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 37109                                          ;mov	word [offDefBlock],0
 37110 000039FB C606[0847]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37111 00003A00 8026[0347]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 37112                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37113 00003A05 29D2                    	sub	dx,dx
 37114 00003A07 8916[0647]              	mov	[offDefBlock],dx ; 0
 37115                                  
 37116 00003A0B E85706                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 37117                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37118                                  	;sub	dx,dx		; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 37119                                  
 37120                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 37121                                  
 37122                                  menu_process:
 37123 00003A0E E87A06                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 37124 00003A11 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 37125 00003A13 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37126 00003A15 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 37127 00003A17 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 37128 00003A19 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 37129 00003A1B 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 37130 00003A1D 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 37131 00003A1F 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 37132 00003A21 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 37133 00003A23 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 37134 00003A25 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 37135 00003A27 749E                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 37136 00003A29 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 37137 00003A2B 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 37138 00003A2D 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 37139 00003A2F 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 37140 00003A31 E8C307                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 37141 00003A34 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 37142 00003A36 F9                              stc                     ;
 37143 00003A37 E82607                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 37144 00003A3A EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 37145                                  menu_numlock:
 37146 00003A3C E8EBFE                          call    set_numlock
 37147 00003A3F EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 37148                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 37149 00003A41 EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 37150                                  
 37151                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 37152                                  
 37153                                  menu_default:
 37154 00003A43 8936[0647]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 37155 00003A47 803E[0947]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 37156 00003A4C 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 37157 00003A4E E8EA05                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 37158 00003A51 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 37159 00003A53 E8FB05                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 37160 00003A56 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 37161 00003A58 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 37162 00003A5A E80D06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 37163 00003A5D 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 37164                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 37165 00003A60 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 37166 00003A62 B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 37167                                  timeout_ok:                    ;
 37168 00003A64 881E[0847]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 37169                                  timeout_skip:
 37170 00003A68 EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 37171                                  
 37172                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 37173                                  
 37174                                  menu_item:
 37175                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 37176 00003A6A 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 37177 00003A6D 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 37178 00003A6F 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 37179 00003A71 E83303                          call    srch_block      ;
 37180 00003A74 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 37181 00003A76 F9                              stc                     ;
 37182 00003A77 E8E606                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 37183 00003A7A EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 37184                                  
 37185                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 37186                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 37187                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 37188                                  
 37189                                  menu_itemfound:
 37190 00003A7C 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 37191 00003A7D 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 37192 00003A7F 8887[0A47]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 37193 00003A83 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 37194                                  
 37195                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 37196                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 37197                                  ;   description...
 37198                                  
 37199 00003A85 89B7[1447]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 37200 00003A89 89B7[2847]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 37201 00003A8D 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 37202 00003A8F E8A905                          call    skip_token      ;
 37203 00003A92 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 37204 00003A94 E8BA05                          call    skip_delim      ;
 37205 00003A97 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 37206 00003A99 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 37207 00003A9B 89BF[2847]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 37208                                  
 37209                                  menu_nextitem:
 37210 00003A9F E8C305                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37211 00003AA2 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 37212                                  
 37213                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 37214                                  
 37215                                  menu_getdefault:
 37216 00003AA5 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 37217 00003AA7 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 37218 00003AA9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 37219 00003AAB E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 37220                                  menu_valid:
 37221 00003AAE 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 37222 00003AB0 8816[0547]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 37223 00003AB4 8B3E[0647]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 37224 00003AB8 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 37225 00003ABA 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 37226 00003ABC 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 37227                                  menu_chkdefault:
 37228 00003ABD 53                              push    bx              ;
 37229 00003ABE 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37230 00003AC0 8BB7[1447]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 37231 00003AC4 B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 37232 00003AC7 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37233 00003AC8 06                              push    es              ;
 37234 00003AC9 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37235 00003ACA E81A03                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 37236 00003ACD 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37237 00003ACE 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37238 00003ACF 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 37239 00003AD1 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37240 00003AD2 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 37241 00003AD6 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 37242                                  menu_nodefault:
 37243 00003AD8 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 37244                                  menu_setdefault:
 37245 00003ADA 881E[0447]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 37246                                  
 37247                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 37248                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 37249                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 37250                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 37251                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 37252                                  ;   with no timeout)
 37253                                  
 37254 00003ADE 803E[0847]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 37255 00003AE3 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 37256 00003AE5 F606[0347]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 37257 00003AEA 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 37258 00003AEC E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 37259                                  
 37260                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 37261                                  
 37262                                  menu_display:
 37263 00003AEF B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 37264 00003AF1 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37265 00003AF3 B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 37266 00003AF5 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37267 00003AF7 06                              push    es              ;
 37268 00003AF8 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 37269 00003AFB 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 37270 00003AFD 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 37271 00003B01 A3[0147]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 37272 00003B04 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 37273 00003B08 A2[0047]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 37274 00003B0B A1[FB46]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 37275 00003B0E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37276 00003B10 B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 37277 00003B13 8A3E[FA46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 37278 00003B17 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 37279                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 37280 00003B19 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 37281 00003B1E FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 37282                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 37283 00003B20 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 37284 00003B25 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 37285 00003B27 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 37286 00003B29 8A36[FE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 37287                                  menu_clear:
 37288 00003B2D CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 37289 00003B2F 07                              pop     es              ;
 37290 00003B30 8836[FE46]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 37291 00003B34 BA[124C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 37292 00003B37 E89709                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 37293                                  
 37294 00003B3A F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37295 00003B3F 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 37296 00003B41 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37297 00003B45 8A36[FE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 37298 00003B49 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 37299 00003B4B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 37300 00003B4D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37301 00003B4F BA[604C]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 37302 00003B52 E87C09                          call    print           ;
 37303 00003B55 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 37304 00003B57 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37305 00003B59 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
