 37306 00003B5C 8816[FD46]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 37307                                  
 37308                                  menu_nostatus:
 37309 00003B60 BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 37310                                  menu_disploop:
 37311 00003B63 E8B002                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 37312 00003B66 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode
 37313 00003B67 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 37314 00003B6B 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 37315                                  
 37316                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 37317                                  
 37318 00003B6D B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 37319 00003B6F 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37320 00003B71 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 37321 00003B74 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37322 00003B78 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 37323 00003B7A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37324                                  
 37325 00003B7C BA[4D4C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 37326 00003B7F E84F09                          call    print           ;
 37327 00003B82 E82903                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 37328 00003B85 BA[1E4A]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 37329 00003B88 E84609                          call    print           ;
 37330 00003B8B FF36[FF46]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 37331 00003B8F 800E[FF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 37332 00003B94 E86704                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 37333 00003B97 8F06[FF46]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 37334                                  
 37335                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 37336                                  
 37337                                  menu_autoselect:
 37338 00003B9B 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1 ; 0FFFFh	; clean boot requested?
 37339 00003B9E 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 37340 00003BA0 E8F105                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 37341                                  menu_abort:
 37342 00003BA3 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 37343 00003BA5 E9E400                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 37344                                  
 37345                                  normal_boot:
 37346 00003BA8 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; back to top-level menu?
 37347 00003BAB 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 37348 00003BAD 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 37349 00003BB1 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37350 00003BB3 E9FFFD                          jmp     menu_search
 37351                                  
 37352                                  not_topmenu:
 37353 00003BB6 80BF[0A47]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 37354 00003BBB 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 37355 00003BBD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37356 00003BBF 8BBF[1447]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 37357 00003BC3 E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 37358 00003BC6 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 37359 00003BC8 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 37360 00003BCA E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 37361                                  
 37362                                  not_submenu:
 37363 00003BCD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 37364 00003BCF 8B9F[1447]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 37365                                  
 37366                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 37367                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 37368                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 37369                                  
 37370                                  no_selection:
 37371 00003BD3 891E[0647]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 37372 00003BD7 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 37373 00003BDB 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37374 00003BDD 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37375 00003BDE 8E1E[B614]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 37376 00003BE2 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 37377                                  
 37378                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 37379                                  ;
 37380                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 37381                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 37382                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 37383                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 37384                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 37385                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 37386                                  ;
 37387                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 37388                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 37389                                  
 37390                                  copyblock_loop:
 37391 00003BE4 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 37392 00003BE5 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 37393 00003BE8 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37394 00003BE9 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37395                                  
 37396                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 37397                                  
 37398                                  copyblock_begin:
 37399                                  
 37400                                  ; 10/09/2023
 37401                                  %if 0
 37402                                          push    ax              ;
 37403                                          push    cx              ;
 37404                                          push    si              ;
 37405                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 37406                                          mov     di,szCommon
 37407                                          push    ds              ;
 37408                                          push    cs              ;
 37409                                          pop     ds              ;
 37410                                          call    comp_names      ;
 37411                                          pop     ds              ;
 37412                                          pop     di              ;
 37413                                          pop     si              ;
 37414                                          pop     cx              ;
 37415                                          pop     ax              ;
 37416                                          je	short copyblock_check
 37417                                  %endif
 37418                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37419 00003BEB 57                      	push	di
 37420 00003BEC BF[4947]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 37421 00003BEF E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 37422 00003BF2 5F                      	pop	di
 37423 00003BF3 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 37424                                  
 37425 00003BF5 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 37426 00003BF7 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 37427 00003BF9 57                              push    di              ;
 37428 00003BFA 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 37429 00003BFC 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37430 00003BFD 06                              push    es              ;
 37431 00003BFE 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37432 00003BFF E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 37433 00003C02 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37434 00003C03 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37435                                  copyblock_check:
 37436 00003C04 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37437 00003C06 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 37438 00003C08 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37439 00003C0B EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 37440                                  
 37441                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 37442 00003C0D E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 37443 00003C10 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 37444 00003C13 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37445 00003C15 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37446 00003C17 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 37447 00003C19 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 37448 00003C1B EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 37449                                  ;
 37450                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 37451                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 37452                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 37453                                  ;
 37454                                  move_config:
 37455 00003C1D 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 37456 00003C1F 51                              push    cx              ;
 37457                                  ;
 37458                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 37459                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 37460                                  ;
 37461                                   	;mov	cx,7
 37462 00003C20 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 37463 00003C23 BE[3C47]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 37464 00003C26 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 37465                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 37466                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 37467                                  copy_boot: 
 37468                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 37469 00003C27 2E                              cs
 37470 00003C28 AC                      	lodsb
 37471 00003C29 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 37472 00003C2B 47                              inc     di              ;
 37473 00003C2C E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 37474                                  
 37475 00003C2E 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 37476                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 37477                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37478 00003C2F B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 37479 00003C31 2E8B36[0647]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 37480 00003C36 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 37481 00003C38 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 37482 00003C3A 0E                              push    cs              ;
 37483 00003C3B 07                              pop     es              ;
 37484 00003C3C BE[4947]                        mov     si,szCommon
 37485 00003C3F 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 37486 00003C42 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 37487 00003C45 7406                            je	short l2	;
 37488 00003C47 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37489 00003C49 46                              inc     si              ;
 37490 00003C4A 47                              inc     di              ;
 37491 00003C4B E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 37492 00003C4D C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 37493 00003C50 07                              pop     es              ;
 37494                                  
 37495                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 37496                                  
 37497 00003C51 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 37498 00003C53 2E893E[B414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37499 00003C58 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37500 00003C5A 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 37501                                  
 37502 00003C5B 51                              push    cx              ;
 37503 00003C5C F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 37504 00003C5E 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37505 00003C5F 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 37506 00003C61 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37507                                  
 37508                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 37509                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 37510                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 37511                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 37512                                  ;   is empty.
 37513                                  
 37514 00003C62 06                              push    es              ;
 37515 00003C63 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 37516 00003C65 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 37517 00003C66 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 37518 00003C6C E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 37519 00003C6F 07                              pop     es
 37520                                  
 37521                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 37522                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 37523                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 37524                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 37525                                  
 37526                                  menu_done:
 37527 00003C70 803E[FB46]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 37528 00003C75 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 37529 00003C77 06                              push    es              ;
 37530 00003C78 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 37531 00003C7B 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 37532 00003C7D A1[0147]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 37533 00003C80 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 37534 00003C84 A0[0047]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 37535 00003C87 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 37536 00003C8B 07                              pop     es              ;
 37537                                  menu_exit:
 37538 00003C8C 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 37539 00003C90 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 37540                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*) - Erdogan Tan
 37541                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 37542                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 37543                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 37544 00003C94 C3                      	retn
 37545                                  
 37546                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 37547                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 37548                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 37549                                  
 37550                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37551                                  ;
 37552                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 37553                                  ;
 37554                                  ;   INPUT
 37555                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 37556                                  ;
 37557                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37558                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 37559                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 37560                                  ;
 37561                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37562                                  ;       None
 37563                                  ;
 37564                                  ;   NOTES
 37565                                  ;       None
 37566                                  ;
 37567                                  ;   HISTORY
 37568                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37569                                  ;
 37570                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37571                                  
 37572                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37573                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 37574                                  
 37575                                  copy_envvar:
 37576 00003C95 51                              push    cx              ;
 37577 00003C96 56                              push    si              ;
 37578 00003C97 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37579 00003C98 06                              push    es              ;
 37580 00003C99 06                              push    es              ;
 37581 00003C9A 8E06[B614]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 37582 00003C9E 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 37583                                  
 37584                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 37585                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 37586                                  ;   config.sys line)
 37587                                  ;
 37588                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 37589                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 37590                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 37591                                  
 37592 00003C9F 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 37593                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 37594 00003CA1 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 37595 00003CA2 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 37596                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37597 00003CA4 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 37598 00003CA6 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 37599                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37600 00003CA8 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 37601 00003CAA 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 37602                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37603 00003CAC 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 37604 00003CAE 41                              inc     cx              ;
 37605 00003CAF 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 37606 00003CB1 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 37607 00003CB3 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 37608 00003CB5 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 37609 00003CB7 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 37610 00003CB9 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 37611 00003CBA 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 37612                                  copy_varsrch:
 37613 00003CBC 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 37614 00003CBF 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 37615 00003CC1 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 37616 00003CC3 51                              push    cx              ;
 37617 00003CC4 56                              push    si              ;
 37618 00003CC5 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 37619 00003CC7 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37620 00003CC8 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37621 00003CC9 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 37622 00003CCB 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 37623 00003CCF 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 37624                                  
 37625                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 37626                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 37627                                  
 37628 00003CD1 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37629 00003CD4 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 37630 00003CD6 56                              push    si              ;
 37631 00003CD7 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 37632 00003CD9 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 37633 00003CDB 2E8B0E[B414]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 37634 00003CE0 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 37635                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 37636                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 37637                                  
 37638 00003CE2 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 37639 00003CE3 26                      	es	; 26h
 37640 00003CE4 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 37641                                  
 37642 00003CE5 5E                      	pop     si
 37643                                  copy_envprep:
 37644 00003CE6 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 37645 00003CE9 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 37646 00003CEB 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 37647 00003CEE 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 37648                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 37649                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37650                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 37651 00003CF0 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 37652 00003CF1 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37653 00003CF3 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37654 00003CF5 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37655 00003CF7 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37656 00003CF9 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 37657 00003CFA EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37658                                  
 37659                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 37660 00003CFC 51                              push    cx              ;
 37661 00003CFD B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37662 00003D00 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 37663 00003D02 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37664 00003D03 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 37665                                  
 37666                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37667                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 37668                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 37669                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37670                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37671                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37672                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37673                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 37674                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37675                                  
 37676                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 37677 00003D05 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 37678 00003D07 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 37679                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 37680 00003D08 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 37681 00003D0B 2E893E[B414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37682                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 37683 00003D10 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 37684                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 37685 00003D11 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 37686 00003D12 07                              pop     es              ;
 37687 00003D13 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37688 00003D14 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37689 00003D15 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37690                                  
 37691                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37692 00003D16 C3                              retn
 37693                                  
 37694                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37695                                  ;
 37696                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 37697                                  ;
 37698                                  ;   INPUT
 37699                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37700                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37701                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 37702                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 37703                                  ;
 37704                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37705                                  ;       Same as above
 37706                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 37707                                  ;
 37708                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37709                                  ;       All
 37710                                  ;
 37711                                  ;   NOTES
 37712                                  ;       None
 37713                                  ;
 37714                                  ;   HISTORY
 37715                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37716                                  ;
 37717                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37718                                  
 37719                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37720                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 37721                                  
 37722                                  copy_block:
 37723 00003D17 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 37724 00003D1A 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 37725 00003D1C 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37726 00003D1E 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 37727 00003D20 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 37728                                  
 37729 00003D22 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 37730 00003D24 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 37731 00003D26 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 37732                                  
 37733                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 37734                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 37735                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 37736                                  
 37737 00003D28 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 37738 00003D2D 57                              push    di              ;
 37739                                  
 37740 00003D2E BF[4447]                        mov     di,szMenu
 37741 00003D31 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 37742 00003D34 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37743                                  
 37744 00003D36 BF[4947]                        mov     di,szCommon
 37745 00003D39 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 37746 00003D3C 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37747                                  
 37748 00003D3E 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 37749 00003D40 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 37750 00003D43 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 37751                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37752                                  	;pop    di              ;
 37753 00003D45 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 37754 00003D47 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 37755 00003D48 51                              push    cx              ;
 37756 00003D49 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 37757 00003D4B 56                              push    si              ;
 37758 00003D4C 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 37759 00003D4D 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 37760 00003D4F E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 37761 00003D52 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 37762 00003D55 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37763 00003D56 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37764 00003D57 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 37765 00003D59 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37766                                  
 37767                                  copy_error:
 37768                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37769 00003D5B F8                      	clc
 37770                                  copy_skip:
 37771 00003D5C 5F                              pop     di
 37772                                  ;copy_error:
 37773                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 37774                                  	;clc                    ;
 37775 00003D5D E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 37776 00003D60 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37777                                  
 37778                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 37779                                  
 37780                                  copy_line:
 37781 00003D62 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37782 00003D64 47                              inc     di              ;
 37783 00003D65 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 37784 00003D67 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 37785 00003D69 2E803E[B914]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 37786 00003D6F 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 37787 00003D71 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 37788 00003D74 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 37789 00003D76 47                              inc     di              ;
 37790 00003D77 47                              inc     di              ;
 37791 00003D78 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 37792                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 37793 00003D7A E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 37794 00003D7D 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 37795 00003D7F 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37796 00003D81 47                              inc     di              ;
 37797                                  copy_next:
 37798 00003D82 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 37799 00003D84 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 37800                                  
 37801                                  copy_nextline:
 37802 00003D86 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37803 00003D89 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 37804                                  
 37805                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37806                                  ;copy_done:
 37807                                          ;retn
 37808                                  
 37809                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37810                                  ;
 37811                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 37812                                  ;
 37813                                  ;   INPUT
 37814                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 37815                                  ;
 37816                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37817                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 37818                                  ;
 37819                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37820                                  ;       DX
 37821                                  ;
 37822                                  ;   NOTES
 37823                                  ;       None
 37824                                  ;
 37825                                  ;   HISTORY
 37826                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37827                                  ;
 37828                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37829                                  
 37830                                  get_linenum:
 37831 00003D8B 50                              push    ax              ;
 37832 00003D8C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 37833 00003D8E 51                              push    cx              ;
 37834 00003D8F 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 37835 00003D91 56                              push    si              ;
 37836 00003D92 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37837 00003D97 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 37838                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 37839 00003D99 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 37840 00003D9C 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 37841 00003D9E 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37842 00003D9F 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 37843 00003DA1 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 37844                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 37845 00003DA3 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37846 00003DA4 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37847 00003DA5 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37848 00003DA6 C3                              retn
 37849                                  
 37850                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37851                                  ;
 37852                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 37853                                  ;
 37854                                  ;   INPUT
 37855                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 37856                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 37857                                  ;
 37858                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37859                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 37860                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 37861                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 37862                                  ;
 37863                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37864                                  ;       None
 37865                                  ;
 37866                                  ;   NOTES
 37867                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 37868                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 37869                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 37870                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 37871                                  ;
 37872                                  ;   HISTORY
 37873                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37874                                  ;
 37875                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37876                                  
 37877                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 37878 00003DA7 50                              push    ax              ;
 37879 00003DA8 51                              push    cx              ;
 37880 00003DA9 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37881 00003DAE 56                              push    si              ;
 37882 00003DAF 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37883 00003DB1 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37884 00003DB2 06                              push    es              ;
 37885 00003DB3 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37886 00003DB4 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 37887 00003DB7 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 37888 00003DB9 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 37889 00003DBB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37890 00003DBC 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37891 00003DBD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37892 00003DBE 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37893                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 37894 00003DBF C3                              retn			;
 37895                                  
 37896                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37897                                  ;
 37898                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 37899                                  ;
 37900                                  ;   INPUT
 37901                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 37902                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 37903                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 37904                                  ;
 37905                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37906                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 37907                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37908                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37909                                  ;
 37910                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37911                                  ;       AX
 37912                                  ;
 37913                                  ;   NOTES
 37914                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 37915                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 37916                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 37917                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37918                                  ;
 37919                                  ;   HISTORY
 37920                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37921                                  ;
 37922                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37923                                  
 37924                                  find_block:
 37925 00003DC0 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37926 00003DC3 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 37927 00003DC5 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 37928 00003DC7 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 37929 00003DC9 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 37930 00003DCB 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 37931 00003DCD 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 37932 00003DCF 2E800E[B914]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37933 00003DD5 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 37934                                  check_line:
 37935 00003DD7 2E800E[B914]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37936 00003DDD E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 37937 00003DE0 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 37938                                  next_line:
 37939 00003DE2 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 37940 00003DE5 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 37941                                  ;find_exit:
 37942                                  ;	retn
 37943                                  
 37944                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37945                                  ;
 37946                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 37947                                  ;
 37948                                  ;   INPUT
 37949                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 37950                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37951                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37952                                  ;
 37953                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37954                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 37955                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37956                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37957                                  ;
 37958                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37959                                  ;       AX
 37960                                  ;
 37961                                  ;   NOTES
 37962                                  ;       None
 37963                                  ;
 37964                                  ;   HISTORY
 37965                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37966                                  ;
 37967                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37968                                  
 37969                                  comp_names:
 37970 00003DE7 57                              push    di              ;
 37971                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 37972 00003DE8 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 37973 00003DEB 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 37974 00003DED E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 37975 00003DF0 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 37976 00003DF2 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 37977 00003DF4 47                              inc     di              ;
 37978 00003DF5 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 37979                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 37980 00003DF8 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 37981 00003DFA 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 37982 00003DFC F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 37983                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 37984 00003DFD 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37985 00003DFE C3                              retn			;
 37986                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 37987 00003DFF 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 37988 00003E01 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 37989 00003E04 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 37990 00003E06 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 37991                                  
 37992                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37993                                  
 37994                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37995                                  comp_names_x:
 37996                                  	;
 37997                                  comp_names_safe:
 37998 00003E08 50                              push    ax
 37999 00003E09 51                              push    cx
 38000 00003E0A 56                              push	si
 38001 00003E0B 1E                              push    ds
 38002 00003E0C 0E                              push    cs
 38003 00003E0D 1F                              pop     ds
 38004 00003E0E E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 38005 00003E11 1F                              pop     ds
 38006 00003E12 5E                      	pop	si
 38007 00003E13 59                              pop     cx
 38008 00003E14 58                              pop     ax
 38009 00003E15 C3                              retn
 38010                                  
 38011                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38012                                  ;
 38013                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 38014                                  ;
 38015                                  ;   INPUT
 38016                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 38017                                  ;
 38018                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38019                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 38020                                  ;
 38021                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38022                                  ;       None
 38023                                  ;
 38024                                  ;   NOTES
 38025                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 38026                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 38027                                  ;
 38028                                  ;   HISTORY
 38029                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38030                                  ;
 38031                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38032                                  
 38033                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38034                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 38035                                  
 38036                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 38037 00003E16 50                              push    ax              ;
 38038 00003E17 53                              push    bx              ;
 38039 00003E18 51                              push    cx              ;
 38040 00003E19 52                              push    dx              ;
 38041 00003E1A 56                              push    si              ;
 38042 00003E1B B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38043 00003E1D 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 38044 00003E21 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 38045 00003E23 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 38046 00003E24 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38047 00003E26 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 38048 00003E28 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 38049 00003E2B B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 38050 00003E2D CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 38051 00003E2F 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38052 00003E31 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 38053 00003E33 8A26[FA46]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 38054 00003E37 3A1E[0447]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 38055 00003E3B 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 38056 00003E3D 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 38057 00003E40 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 38058 00003E42 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 38059 00003E44 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 38060 00003E46 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 38061 00003E48 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 38062 00003E4A 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 38063                                  print_other:                    ;
 38064 00003E4D B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 38065 00003E4F 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 38066 00003E51 8BBF[2847]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 38067 00003E55 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 38068 00003E57 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 38069 00003E5B B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 38070 00003E5D B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 38071 00003E60 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38072 00003E62 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38073 00003E64 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38074 00003E66 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38075                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 38076 00003E68 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 38077 00003E6B CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 38078 00003E6D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38079 00003E6F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38080 00003E71 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38081                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 38082 00003E73 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 38083 00003E76 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 38084 00003E78 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38085 00003E7A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38086 00003E7C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38087 00003E7E 06                              push    es              ;
 38088                                  print_loop:                     ;
 38089 00003E7F 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 38090 00003E82 47                              inc     di              ;
 38091 00003E83 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 38092 00003E85 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 38093 00003E87 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 38094                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 38095 00003E89 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 38096 00003E8B 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 38097 00003E8D 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 38098 00003E8F 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 38099 00003E91 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 38100 00003E93 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38101 00003E95 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38102 00003E97 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 38103 00003E9A 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 38104 00003E9C B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38105 00003E9E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38106 00003EA0 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 38107                                  print_done:                     ;
 38108 00003EA2 07                              pop     es              ;
 38109 00003EA3 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38110 00003EA4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38111 00003EA6 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 38112 00003EA8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 38113 00003EA9 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38114 00003EAA 59                              pop     cx              ;
 38115 00003EAB 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38116 00003EAC 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38117 00003EAD C3                              retn			;
 38118                                  
 38119                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38120                                  ;
 38121                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 38122                                  ;
 38123                                  ;   INPUT
 38124                                  ;       None
 38125                                  ;
 38126                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38127                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 38128                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 38129                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 38130                                  ;
 38131                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38132                                  ;       None
 38133                                  ;
 38134                                  ;   NOTES
 38135                                  ;       None
 38136                                  ;
 38137                                  ;   HISTORY
 38138                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38139                                  ;
 38140                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38141                                  
 38142                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 38143 00003EAE 8A1E[0447]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 38144 00003EB2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38145 00003EB4 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 38146 00003EB7 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 38147 00003EBA 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 38148 00003EBF 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 38149 00003EC1 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 38150 00003EC3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 38151 00003EC5 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 38152                                  check_time:
 38153 00003EC7 A0[0847]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 38154 00003ECA 2A06[0947]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 38155 00003ECE 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 38156 00003ED0 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 38157 00003ED5 C606[0947]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 38158 00003EDA E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 38159                                  show_time:
 38160 00003EDD 53                              push    bx              ;
 38161 00003EDE 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 38162 00003EE0 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 38163 00003EE4 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38164 00003EE6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38165 00003EE8 52                              push    dx              ;
 38166 00003EE9 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 38167 00003EEC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38168 00003EEE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38169 00003EF0 BA[C04C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 38170 00003EF3 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 38171 00003EF6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 38172 00003EF8 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 38173 00003EF9 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 38174 00003EFB F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 38175 00003EFD 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 38176 00003EFF 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 38177 00003F01 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 38178 00003F03 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 38179 00003F05 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 38180 00003F07 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 38181 00003F09 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 38182 00003F0B CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 38183 00003F0D 5A                              pop     dx
 38184 00003F0E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 38185 00003F10 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38186 00003F12 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38187                                  input_key:
 38188 00003F13 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 38189 00003F15 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 38190 00003F17 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 38191 00003F19 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 38192 00003F1B 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 38193 00003F20 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 38194 00003F22 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 38195 00003F24 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 38196 00003F26 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 38197 00003F28 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 38198 00003F2A 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 38199 00003F2C 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 38200 00003F2E B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 38201                                  got_time:
 38202 00003F30 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 38203 00003F32 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 38204 00003F34 0036[0947]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 38205 00003F38 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 38206                                  got_key:
 38207 00003F3A 50                              push    ax              ;
 38208 00003F3B B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 38209 00003F3E 8706[0847]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 38210 00003F42 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 38211 00003F44 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 38212 00003F46 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 38213 00003F47 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 38214 00003F4A 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38215 00003F4E B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 38216 00003F51 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 38217 00003F53 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 38218                                  
 38219                                  timeout_disabled:
 38220 00003F54 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38221 00003F55 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 38222 00003F57 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 38223 00003F59 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 38224 00003F5B 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 38225                                  
 38226 00003F5D 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 38227 00003F5F 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 38228 00003F61 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 38229 00003F64 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 38230 00003F66 FE0E[0447]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 38231 00003F6A E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 38232 00003F6D FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 38233 00003F6F EB12                            jmp     short print1
 38234                                  not_up:
 38235 00003F71 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 38236 00003F73 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 38237 00003F75 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 38238 00003F79 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 38239 00003F7B FE06[0447]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 38240 00003F7F E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 38241 00003F82 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 38242                                  print1: 
 38243 00003F83 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 38244                                  print2: 
 38245 00003F85 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 38246 00003F88 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 38247                                  to_input_key:
 38248 00003F8B EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 38249                                  not_down:
 38250 00003F8D F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 38251 00003F92 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 38252 00003F94 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 38253 00003F96 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 38254 00003F98 8036[0347]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 38255 00003F9D E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 38256 00003FA0 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 38257                                  not_f8:
 38258 00003FA3 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 38259 00003FA5 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 38260                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38261                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 38262                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 38263 00003FA7 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 38264 00003FAC BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 38265 00003FAF B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 38266 00003FB1 EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 38267                                  
 38268                                  normal_key:
 38269 00003FB3 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 38270 00003FB5 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 38271 00003FB7 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 38272 00003FB9 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 38273 00003FBB BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 38274 00003FBE C3                              retn			;
 38275                                  not_backspace:
 38276 00003FBF 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 38277 00003FC1 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 38278 00003FC3 3A06[0547]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 38279 00003FC7 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 38280 00003FC9 A2[0447]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 38281 00003FCC E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 38282 00003FCF 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 38283 00003FD1 EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 38284                                  
 38285                                  select_done:
 38286 00003FD3 B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 38287 00003FD5 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38288 00003FD7 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 38289                                  
 38290                                  	; fall into disp_input
 38291                                  
 38292                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38293                                  
 38294                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38295                                  ;
 38296                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 38297                                  ;
 38298                                  ;   INPUT
 38299                                  ;       AL == character to display
 38300                                  ;
 38301                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38302                                  ;       None
 38303                                  ;
 38304                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38305                                  ;       None
 38306                                  ;
 38307                                  ;   NOTES
 38308                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 38309                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 38310                                  ;
 38311                                  ;   HISTORY
 38312                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38313                                  ;
 38314                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38315                                  
 38316                                  
 38317                                  disp_input:
 38318 00003FD9 50                      	push	ax
 38319                                  	;cmp	al,' '
 38320                                  	;jae	short disp_ok
 38321                                  	;mov	al,' '
 38322                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (Optimization)
 38323 00003FDA B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 38324 00003FDC 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 38325 00003FDE 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 38326                                  disp_ok:
 38327 00003FE0 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 38328                                  disp_input_ok:
 38329 00003FE2 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38330 00003FE4 CD21                    	int	21h
 38331 00003FE6 BA[1E4A]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 38332 00003FE9 E8E504                  	call	print
 38333 00003FEC 58                      	pop	ax
 38334 00003FED C3                      	retn
 38335                                  
 38336                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38337                                  
 38338                                  disp_num:
 38339 00003FEE 53                              push    bx
 38340 00003FEF 0430                            add     al,'0'
 38341 00003FF1 B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 38342 00003FF3 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38343 00003FF7 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 38344 00003FFA CD10                            int     10h
 38345 00003FFC 5B                              pop     bx
 38346 00003FFD C3                              retn
 38347                                  
 38348                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38349                                  ;
 38350                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 38351                                  ;
 38352                                  ;   INPUT
 38353                                  ;       None
 38354                                  ;
 38355                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38356                                  ;       None
 38357                                  ;
 38358                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38359                                  ;       None
 38360                                  ;
 38361                                  ;   NOTES
 38362                                  ;       None
 38363                                  ;
 38364                                  ;   HISTORY
 38365                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38366                                  ;
 38367                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38368                                  
 38369                                  show_status:
 38370 00003FFE 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 38371 00003FFF 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38372 00004003 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38373 00004005 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38374 00004007 52                              push    dx              ; save it
