 38375 00004008 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38376 0000400A 8B16[FD46]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 38377 0000400E F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 38378 00004013 740C                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 38379 00004015 B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 38380 00004017 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38381 00004019 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 38382 0000401C B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 38383                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38384                                  	;int	10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 38385 0000401F EB11                            jmp     short show_done ;
 38386                                  show_onoff: 
 38387 00004021 CD10                            int     10h
 38388                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 38389                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 38390                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 38391                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 38392                                  
 38393 00004023 A0[BC4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 38394 00004026 803E[0347]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 38395 0000402B 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 38396 0000402D A0[B84C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 38397                                  show_noton:                     ;
 38398 00004030 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 38399                                  show_done:	; 10/09/2023
 38400 00004032 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38401                                  ;show_done:                     ;
 38402 00004034 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38403 00004035 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38404 00004037 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 38405 00004039 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38406 0000403A C3                              retn			;
 38407                                  
 38408                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38409                                  
 38410                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38411                                  ;
 38412                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 38413                                  ;
 38414                                  ;   INPUT
 38415                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38416                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38417                                  ;
 38418                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38419                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 38420                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 38421                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 38422                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38423                                  ;
 38424                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38425                                  ;       AX
 38426                                  ;
 38427                                  ;   NOTES
 38428                                  ;       None
 38429                                  ;
 38430                                  ;   HISTORY
 38431                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38432                                  ;
 38433                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38434                                  
 38435                                  skip_token:
 38436 0000403B E84D00                          call    get_char
 38437 0000403E 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 38438 00004040 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 38439 00004043 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 38440                                  skip_check_eol:
 38441 00004045 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 38442 00004047 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 38443 00004049 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38444 0000404B 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 38445 0000404D F8                              clc
 38446                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 38447 0000404E C3                      	retn
 38448                                  skip_token_eol:
 38449 0000404F F9                              stc
 38450                                  skip_token_done:
 38451 00004050 C3                              retn
 38452                                  
 38453                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38454                                  ;
 38455                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 38456                                  ;
 38457                                  ;   INPUT
 38458                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38459                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38460                                  ;
 38461                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38462                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38463                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 38464                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 38465                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38466                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 38467                                  ;
 38468                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38469                                  ;       AX
 38470                                  ;
 38471                                  ;   NOTES
 38472                                  ;       None
 38473                                  ;
 38474                                  ;   HISTORY
 38475                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38476                                  ;
 38477                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38478                                  
 38479                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 38480 00004051 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 38481 00004054 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 38482 00004057 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 38483 00004059 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 38484 0000405C 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 38485 0000405E EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 38486                                  
 38487                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38488                                  ;
 38489                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 38490                                  ;
 38491                                  ;   INPUT
 38492                                  ;       AL == last character read
 38493                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38494                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38495                                  ;
 38496                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38497                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38498                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 38499                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 38500                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38501                                  ;
 38502                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38503                                  ;       AX
 38504                                  ;
 38505                                  ;   NOTES
 38506                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 38507                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 38508                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 38509                                  ;
 38510                                  ;   HISTORY
 38511                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38512                                  ;
 38513                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38514                                  
 38515                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38516                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 38517                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38518                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 38519                                       
 38520                                  	; fall into skip_line
 38521                                  
 38522                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38523                                  ;
 38524                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 38525                                  ;
 38526                                  ;   INPUT
 38527                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38528                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38529                                  ;
 38530                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38531                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38532                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 38533                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38534                                  ;
 38535                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38536                                  ;       AX
 38537                                  ;
 38538                                  ;   NOTES
 38539                                  ;       None
 38540                                  ;
 38541                                  ;   HISTORY
 38542                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38543                                  ;
 38544                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38545                                  
 38546                                  skip_line:
 38547 00004060 E82800                          call    get_char
 38548 00004063 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 38549                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38550 00004065 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38551 00004067 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 38552                                  skip_line_done:
 38553                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 38554 00004069 C3                              retn
 38555                                  
 38556                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38557                                  ;
 38558                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 38559                                  ;
 38560                                  ;   INPUT
 38561                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38562                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38563                                  ;
 38564                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38565                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 38566                                  ;       BX == binary #
 38567                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 38568                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38569                                  ;
 38570                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38571                                  ;       AX
 38572                                  ;
 38573                                  ;   NOTES
 38574                                  ;       None
 38575                                  ;
 38576                                  ;   HISTORY
 38577                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38578                                  ;
 38579                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38580                                  
 38581                                  ; 13/05/2019
 38582                                  
 38583                                  get_number:
 38584 0000406A 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 38585                                  num_loop:
 38586 0000406C E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 38587 0000406F 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 38588 00004071 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 38589 00004073 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 38590 00004075 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 38591 00004077 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 38592 00004079 50                              push    ax              ;
 38593 0000407A B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 38594 0000407D 52                              push    dx              ;
 38595 0000407E F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 38596 00004080 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38597 00004081 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 38598 00004083 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38599 00004084 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 38600 00004086 98                              cbw                     ;
 38601 00004087 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 38602 00004089 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 38603                                  
 38604                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38605                                  ;num_done:
 38606                                          ;retn
 38607                                  
 38608                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38609                                  ;
 38610                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 38611                                  ;
 38612                                  ;   INPUT
 38613                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38614                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38615                                  ;
 38616                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38617                                  ;       AL == next character
 38618                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 38619                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38620                                  ;
 38621                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38622                                  ;       AX
 38623                                  ;
 38624                                  ;   NOTES
 38625                                  ;       None
 38626                                  ;
 38627                                  ;   HISTORY
 38628                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38629                                  ;
 38630                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38631                                  
 38632                                  get_char:
 38633 0000408B 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 38634 0000408E 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 38635                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 38636 00004090 26                      	es	
 38637 00004091 AC                      	lodsb
 38638 00004092 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 38639 00004094 C3                              retn			;
 38640                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 38641 00004095 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 38642                                  nearby_ret:
 38643 00004098 C3                              retn
 38644                                  
 38645                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38646                                  ;
 38647                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 38648                                  ;
 38649                                  ;   INPUT
 38650                                  ;       AL == current command code
 38651                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 38652                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 38653                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 38654                                  ;
 38655                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38656                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 38657                                  ;
 38658                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38659                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 38660                                  ;
 38661                                  ;   NOTES
 38662                                  ;       None
 38663                                  ;
 38664                                  ;   HISTORY
 38665                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38666                                  ;
 38667                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38668                                  
 38669                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38670                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 38671                                  
 38672                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38673                                  query_user:
 38674 00004099 F606[0347]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 38675                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38676 0000409E 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 38677 000040A0 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 38678                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38679                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 38680                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 38681                                  qu_1:
 38682 000040A3 F606[0347]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 38683 000040A8 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 38684 000040AA 50                              push    ax                      ;
 38685 000040AB A0[B814]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 38686 000040AE F606[0347]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 38687 000040B3 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 38688 000040B5 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 38689                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38690 000040B7 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 38691                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38692                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 38693                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 38694                                  
 38695                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38696 000040B9 58                      	pop	ax
 38697 000040BA C3                      	retn

 38699                                  query_all:
 38700                                  
 38701                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 38702                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 38703                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 38704                                  
 38705 000040BB 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38706 000040BC BA[124D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 38707 000040BF 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 38708 000040C1 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 38709                                  
 38710 000040C3 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 38711 000040C5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 38712 000040C7 BF[5047]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 38713                                  find_match:                             ;
 38714 000040CA 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 38715 000040CC 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 38716 000040CE 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 38717 000040D0 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38718 000040D1 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 38719 000040D3 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 38720 000040D5 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 38721                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 38722 000040D8 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 38723                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 38724 000040DA 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 38725 000040DD B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 38726 000040DF B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38727                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 38728 000040E1 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 38729 000040E3 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38730 000040E4 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38731 000040E6 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38732 000040E8 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 38733 000040EA B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 38734 000040EC 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 38735 000040EF 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 38736 000040F1 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 38737                                  cmd_notset:
 38738 000040F3 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 38739                                  line_print:                             ;
 38740                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 38741 000040F5 26                              es
 38742 000040F6 AC                      	lodsb
 38743 000040F7 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 38744 000040F9 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 38745 000040FB B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 38746                                  non_null:                               ;
 38747 000040FD 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 38748 000040FF 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 38749 00004101 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 38750                                          ; 10/09/2023
 38751 00004103 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 38752                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 38753 00004106 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 38754                                  non_space:                              ;
 38755 00004108 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38756 0000410A B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 38757 0000410C CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38758 0000410E EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 38759                                  
 38760                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 38761 00004110 BA[B04C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 38762                                  
 38763                                  generic_prompt:
 38764 00004113 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 38765                                  input_loop:                             ;
 38766 00004116 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 38767 00004118 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 38768 0000411A 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 38769 0000411C 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 38770 0000411E 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 38771 00004121 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 38772 00004123 A0[BC4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 38773 00004126 800E[0347]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 38774 0000412B EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 38775                                  not_func:
 38776 0000412D 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 38777 0000412F 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 38778 00004133 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 38779 00004135 3A06[B84C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 38780 00004139 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 38781 0000413B 803E[B814]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 38782 00004140 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 38783 00004142 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 38784 00004144 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 38785 00004146 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 38786 0000414B A0[B84C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 38787                                  legal_char:                             ;
 38788 0000414E E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 38789 00004151 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38790                                  
 38791 00004152 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 38792 00004156 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 38793                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38794 00004158 F8                      	clc
 38795                                  do_cmd:
 38796 00004159 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38797                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38798                                  	; cf=0
 38799                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 38800 0000415A C3                      	retn
 38801                                  
 38802                                  skip_cmd:

 38807 0000415F C3                      	retn

 38864                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38865                                  
 38866                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38867                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38868                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38869                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38870                                  
 38871                                  disable_autoexec:
 38872                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38873                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38874                                  
 38875 00004194 F606[0347]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 38876 00004199 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 38877 0000419B F606[F946]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 38878 000041A0 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 38879 000041A2 800E[F946]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 38880                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 38881 000041A7 810E[0347]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 38882 000041AD BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38883                                  dae_1:
 38884                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38885 000041B0 A0[3846]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 38886                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 38887 000041B3 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 38888 000041B5 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 38889 000041B7 8A1E[3946]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 38890 000041BB B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 38891 000041BD 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 38892 000041BF 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 38893 000041C2 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 38894 000041C5 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 38895 000041C7 881E[3946]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 38896 000041CB 81C3[3A46]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 38897 000041CF 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 38898                                  disable_loop:                           ;

 38900 000041D3 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 38901 000041D5 4B                              dec     bx                      ;

 38905 000041DB 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 38906                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 38907                                  disable_exit:                           ;

 39047                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39048                                  ; 
 39049                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 39050                                  ;
 39051                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39052                                  
 39053                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 39054                                  
 39055                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39056                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 39057                                  mapcase:
 39058 00004243 51                      	push	cx
 39059 00004244 56                      	push	si
 39060 00004245 1E                      	push	ds
 39061                                  
 39062 00004246 06                      	push	es
 39063 00004247 1F                      	pop	ds
 39064                                  
 39065                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39066                                  
 39067                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39068                                  
 39069                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 39070 00004248 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 39071                                  ;else
 39072                                  ;	xor	si,si
 39073                                  ;endif
 39074                                  	; 02/11/2022
 39075                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39076                                  	;xor	si, si
 39077                                  
 39078                                  convloop:
 39079 0000424A AC                      	lodsb
 39080 0000424B 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 39081 0000424D 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 39082 0000424F 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 39083 00004251 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 39084 00004253 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 39085 00004255 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 39086                                  noconv:
 39087                                  
 39088                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39089                                  
 39090                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39091                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 39092                                  
 39093                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 39094                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 39095                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 39096                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 39097                                  ;
 39098 00004258 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 39099 0000425B 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 39100 0000425D 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 39101 0000425F 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 39102                                  check_eol:
 39103 00004261 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 39104 00004263 7406                    	je	short convdone
 39105 00004265 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 39106 00004267 7402                    	je	short convdone
 39107                                  ;endif
 39108                                  	; 02/11/2022
 39109 00004269 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 39110                                  convdone:
 39111 0000426B 1F                      	pop	ds
 39112 0000426C 5E                      	pop	si
 39113 0000426D 59                      	pop	cx
 39114 0000426E C3                      	retn

 39121                                  ; perform bounds check.

 39124                                  
 39125                                  round:
 39126                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)

 39136

 39139                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 39140 0000427D C706[6203]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0

 39149 0000428C F606[BD14]02            	test	byte [setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2

 39232                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39233                                  ;
 39234                                  ; procedure : getnum
 39235                                  ;
 39236                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 39237                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 39238                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 39239                                  ;
 39240                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39241                                  
 39242                                  getnum:
 39243 000042E2 53                      	push	bx
 39244 000042E3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 39245                                  b2:
 39246 000042E5 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 39247 000042E8 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 39248                                  
 39249 000042EA 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 39250 000042EB 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 39251                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 39252                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39253 000042EC B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 39254 000042EE F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 39255 000042F0 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 39256 000042F1 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 39257 000042F3 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 39258 000042F6 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 39259                                  
 39260 000042F8 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 39261                                  
 39262 000042F9 E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 39263 000042FC 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 39264 000042FE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 39265 00004300 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 39266 00004302 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 39267 00004304 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 39268 00004306 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 39269 00004308 7417                    	je	short b15
 39270 0000430A 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 39271 0000430F 7410                    	je	short b15
 39272 00004311 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 39273                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39274                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39275                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 39276                                  	;nop
 39277 00004313 740C                    	je	short b15
 39278 00004315 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 39279 00004317 7408                    	je	short b15
 39280 00004319 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 39281 0000431B 7404                    	je	short b15
 39282 0000431D 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 39283 0000431F 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 39284                                  b15:
 39285 00004321 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 39286 00004326 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 39287                                  b1:
 39288 0000432B 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 39289 0000432D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 39290 0000432F 5B                      	pop	bx
 39291 00004330 C3                      	retn
 39292                                  badnum:
 39293                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39294                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 39295 00004331 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 39296                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 39297 00004333 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 39298 00004337 5B                      	pop	bx
 39299 00004338 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 39300 00004339 C3                      	retn
 39301

 39303                                  
 39304                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 39305                                  
 39306                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39307                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 39308                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 39309                                  ;	si = 0
 39310                                  ;	ax = country id
 39311                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 39312                                  ;	bx = file handle
 39313                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 39314                                  ;
 39315                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 39316                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 39317                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 39318                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 39319                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39320                                  
 39321                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39322                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 39323                                  
 39324                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39325                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)	
 39326                                  
 39327 0000433A 57                      	push	di
 39328 0000433B 50                      	push	ax
 39329 0000433C 52                      	push	dx
 39330                                  
 39331 0000433D 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 39332 0000433F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 39333 00004341 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 39334 00004344 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 39335 00004347 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 39336                                  
 39337 00004349 06                      	push	es
 39338 0000434A 56                      	push	si
 39339                                  
 39340 0000434B 0E                      	push	cs
 39341 0000434C 07                      	pop	es
 39342                                  
 39343 0000434D BF[9E45]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 39344 00004350 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 39345 00004353 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 39346                                  
 39347 00004355 5E                      	pop	si
 39348 00004356 07                      	pop	es
 39349 00004357 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 39350                                  
 39351 00004359 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 39352 0000435C 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 39353 0000435F 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 39354                                  
 39355 00004361 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 39356 00004362 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 39357 00004364 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 39358 00004367 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 39359 0000436A E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 39360 0000436D 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 39361                                  
 39362 0000436F 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 39363 00004371 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 39364 00004375 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 39365                                  
 39366 00004377 46                      	inc	si
 39367 00004378 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 39368 00004379 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 39369 0000437A 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 39370 0000437B 5F                      	pop	di
 39371                                  
 39372                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 39373 0000437C 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 39374 0000437F 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 39375                                  
 39376                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 39377                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 39378                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39379 00004381 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 39380 00004383 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 39381 00004385 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 39382 00004388 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 39383                                  
 39384                                  setdoscntry_next:
 39385 0000438A 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 39386 0000438C 46                      	inc	si
 39387 0000438D 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 39388 0000438E E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 39389                                  
 39390                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 39391                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39392 00004390 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 39393                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 39394 00004391 F9                      	stc
 39395 00004392 C3                      	retn
 39396                                  
 39397                                  setdosdata_fail:
 39398 00004393 5E                      	pop	si
 39399 00004394 59                      	pop	cx
 39400 00004395 5F                      	pop	di
 39401 00004396 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 39402                                  
 39403                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 39404 00004398 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 39405                                  
 39406                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 39407 0000439B 2E8916[A645]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 39408 000043A0 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 39409 000043A3 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 39410 000043A6 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 39411 000043A9 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 39412 000043AC 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 39413

 39417

 39422

 39433

 39435 000043CE B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 39436 000043D1 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 39437 000043D3 F9                      	stc
 39438 000043D4 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 39439 000043D6 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 39440                                  
 39441 000043D8 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 39442 000043DA 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 39443

 39447 000043E5 F9                      	stc

 39449 000043E8 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 39450

 39452 000043EB BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 39453 000043EE 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 39454 000043F0 5E                      	pop	si

 39456 000043F4 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 39457 000043F7 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 39458 000043F9 F9                      	stc
 39459 000043FA CD21                    	int	21h
 39460 000043FC 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 39461                                  
 39462 000043FE 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 39463 00004400 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 39464

 39466 00004405 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 39467 00004408 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file

 39469 0000440B 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.

 39567                                  getcountrydestination:
 39568                                  
 39569                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39570                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 39571                                  ;
 39572                                  ;input: al - data id
 39573                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 39574                                  ;on return:
 39575                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 39576                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 39577                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39578                                  
 39579                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39580                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 39581                                  
 39582                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39583                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 39584                                  
 39585 0000445F 51                      	push	cx
 39586                                  	;add	di,74
 39587 00004460 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 39588                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 39589 00004463 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 39590 00004466 47                      	inc	di
 39591 00004467 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 39592                                  
 39593                                  getcntrydest:

 39598 00004471 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 39599                                  
 39600 00004473 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 39601 00004476 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 39602

 39609                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 39610                                  getcntrydest_exit:

 39612 0000447E 59                      	pop	cx
 39613 0000447F C3                      	retn

 39637                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39638                                  
 39639                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 39640                                  
 39641                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39642                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 39643                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 39644                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 39645                                  ;
 39646                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 39647                                  ;	 be moved.
 39648                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 39649                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 39650                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 39651                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 39652                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 39653                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 39654                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39655                                  
 39656 0000448A 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 39657 0000448B B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 39658 0000448E F9                      	stc
 39659 0000448F CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 39660 00004491 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 39661 00004492 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 39662                                  
 39663 00004494 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 39664 00004496 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 39665 00004498 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 39666 0000449A F9                      	stc
 39667 0000449B CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 39668                                  ricb_exit:
 39669 0000449D C3                      	retn
 39670

 39673                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 39674                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 39675                                  %if 0
 39676                                  
 39677                                  set_country_path:
 39678                                  
 39679                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39680                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 39681                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 39682                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 39683                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 39684                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 39685                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 39686                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39687                                  
 39688                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39689                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 39690                                  
 39691                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39692                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 39693                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 39694                                  
 39695                                  	push	si
 39696                                  
 39697                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39698                                  	push	es
 39699                                  	pop	ds
 39700                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 39701                                  
 39702                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 39703                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 39704                                  
 39705                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39706                                  	inc	si
 39707                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 39708                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 39709                                  
 39710                                  scp_default_drv:
 39711                                  	mov	ah,19h
 39712                                  	int	21h
 39713                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 39714                                  
 39715                                  scp_setdrv:
 39716                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 39717                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 39718                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39719                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 39720                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 39721                                  
 39722                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 39723                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 39724                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 39725                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39726                                  	jne	short scp_path
 39727                                  
 39728                                  scp_root_dir:
 39729                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 39730                                  scp_path:
 39731                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 39732                                  
 39733                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 39734                                  scpath_exit:
 39735                                  
 39736                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39737                                  	push	es
 39738                                  	pop	ds
 39739                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 39740                                  
 39741                                  	pop	si
 39742                                  	retn
 39743                                  
 39744                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39745                                  
 39746                                  chk_drive_letter:
 39747                                  
 39748                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 39749                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 39750                                  ;carry set if not.
 39751                                  
 39752                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 39753                                  
 39754                                  	push	ax
 39755                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 39756                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 39757                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 39758                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 39759                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 39760                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 39761                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 39762                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 39763                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39764                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 39765                                  
 39766                                  cdletter_no:
 39767                                  	stc
 39768                                  cdletter_exit:
 39769                                  	pop	ax
 39770                                  	retn
 39771                                  
 39772                                  %endif
